12.7mm CHAC Ammo Box.name: 12.7mm CHAC Ammo Box
12.7mm CHAC Ammo Box.description: The 12.7mm CHAC Ammo Box provides 2512.7mm CHAC RoundsofSniper Ammunition that works with the Anti-materiel Rifle.

12.7mm CHAC Explosive Ammo Box.name: 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Ammo Box
12.7mm CHAC Explosive Ammo Box.description: The 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Ammo Box provides 2512.7mm CHAC Explosive RoundsofSniper Ammunitionthat works with theAnti-materiel Rifle.

12.7mm CHAC Explosive Round.name: 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Round
12.7mm CHAC Explosive Round.description: 12.7mm CHAC Explosive Round is a type of explosiveSniper Ammunitionfor theAnti-materiel Riflethat does 500 projectile damage and 400 explosive damage.

12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Ammo Box.name: 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Ammo Box
12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Ammo Box.description: The 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Ammo Box provides 2512.7mm CHAC Incendiary RoundsofSniper Ammunitionthat works with theAnti-materiel Rifle.

12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Round.name: 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Round
12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Round.description: 12.7mm CHAC Incendiary Round is a type of explosiveSniper Ammunitionfor theAnti-materiel Riflethat does 500 projectile damage and +25% fire damage.

12.7mm CHAC Round.name: 12.7mm CHAC Round
12.7mm CHAC Round.description: 12.7mm CHAC Round is a type ofSniper Ammunitionfor theAnti-materiel Riflethat does 600 damage.

12-Gauge Buckshot Shell.name: 12-Gauge Buckshot Shell
12-Gauge Buckshot Shell.description: 12-Gauge Buckshot Shell, the basic ammunition used byShotguns. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts, this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

12-Gauge CHAC Shell.name: 12-Gauge CHAC Shell
12-Gauge CHAC Shell.description: 12-Gauge CHAC Shell is an advanced purchaseable buckshot ammunition that does up to 450 damage. It pairs well with theCHAC "Boomstick" Shotgunthat can also be purchased from theWorkshop.

12-Gauge CHAC Shell Box.name: 12-Gauge CHAC Shell Box
12-Gauge CHAC Shell Box.description: The 12-Gauge CHAC Shell Box provides 25 rounds of the12-Gauge CHAC Shellthat works with anyShotgunand pairs well with theCHAC "Boomstick" Shotgunthat can also be purchased from theWorkshop.

12-Gauge Cold Steel Shell.name: 12-Gauge Cold Steel Shell
12-Gauge Cold Steel Shell.description: 12-Gauge Cold Steel Shell is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition forShotguns. It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

12-Gauge Explosive Shell.name: 12-Gauge Explosive Shell
12-Gauge Explosive Shell.description: 12-Gauge Explosive Shells are used byShotguns. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised. 12-Gauge Explosive Shells have 6 pellets per shell.

12-Gauge Miasmic Shell.name: 12-Gauge Miasmic Shell
12-Gauge Miasmic Shell.description: 12-Gauge Miasmic Shell, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used byShotguns.

12-Gauge Obsidian Shell.name: 12-Gauge Obsidian Shell
12-Gauge Obsidian Shell.description: 12-Gauge Obsidian Shells are a variant of12-Gauge Buckshot Shellsthat deal fire damage on hit and have a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 12-Gauge Obsidian Shells can decimate Fauna that have a weakness to fire, especially when the 'Burning' modifier occurs. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere.

5.56mm Armor Piercing Round.name: 5.56mm Armor Piercing Round
5.56mm Armor Piercing Round.description: 5.56mm Armor Piercing Round is used by theAssault Rifle.

5.56mm Cold Steel Round.name: 5.56mm Cold Steel Round
5.56mm Cold Steel Round.description: 5.56mm Cold Steel Round is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition for theAssault Rifle. It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

5.56mm Explosive Round.name: 5.56mm Explosive Round
5.56mm Explosive Round.description: The 5.56mm Explosive Round is used by theAssault Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

5.56mm Incendiary Round.name: 5.56mm Incendiary Round
5.56mm Incendiary Round.description: The 5.56mm Incendiary Rounds are used in the fully-automaticTier 4Assault Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

5.56mm Miasmic Round.name: 5.56mm Miasmic Round
5.56mm Miasmic Round.description: 5.56mm Miasmic Round, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used by theAssault Rifle.

5.56mm Obsidian Round.name: 5.56mm Obsidian Round
5.56mm Obsidian Round.description: 5.56mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to5.56mm Incendiary Roundsthat deal fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 5.56mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than5.56mm Rounds. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere.

5.56mm Round.name: 5.56mm Round
5.56mm Round.description: The 5.56mm Rounds are used in the fully-automaticTier 4Assault Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered.

7.62mm Armor Piercing Round.name: 7.62mm Armor Piercing Round
7.62mm Armor Piercing Round.description: 7.62mm Armor Piercing Rounds are used by theBolt Action Rifleand theHunting Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Unlike standard ammunition, the 7.62mm Armor Piercing Round can pierce hardened points and will deal 250 damage, similar to hitting a non-hardened point.

7.62mm CHAC Ammo Box.name: 7.62mm CHAC Ammo Box
7.62mm CHAC Ammo Box.description: The 7.62mm CHAC Ammo Box provides 257.62mm CHAC RoundsofRifle Ammunitionthat works withRifles.

7.62mm Cold Steel Round.name: 7.62mm Cold Steel Round
7.62mm Cold Steel Round.description: 7.62mm Cold Steel Round is a Cold Steel variant of ammunition forRifles. It inflicts extra Frost damage and a chance to slow the target and weaken their attacks.

7.62mm Explosive Round.name: 7.62mm Explosive Round
7.62mm Explosive Round.description: 7.62mm Explosive Rounds are used by theBolt Action Rifleand theHunting Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

7.62mm Incendiary Round.name: 7.62mm Incendiary Round
7.62mm Incendiary Round.description: 7.62mm Incendiary Rounds are used by theBolt Action Rifle/Hunting Rifle. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Hitting a target will set it ablaze, dealing damage for approximately 20 seconds. Deals 8-11 damage a second to normal targets, and 16-22 damage a second to targets that are weak to fire. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere(TBA - no information yet).

7.62mm Miasmic Round.name: 7.62mm Miasmic Round
7.62mm Miasmic Round.description: 7.62mm Miasmic Round, a Miasmic variant of ammunition used byRifles.

7.62mm Obsidian Round.name: 7.62mm Obsidian Round
7.62mm Obsidian Round.description: 7.62mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to7.62mm Incendiary Roundsthat deals fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 7.62mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than7.62mm Rounds. A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere.

Unlike standard ammunition, the 9mm Armor Piercing Round can pierce hardened points and will deal 100 damage, similar to hitting a non-hardened point.

9mm Explosive Round.description: 9mm Explosive Rounds are used by thePistol. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Damages area around target. Caution when using this ammunition is advised.

9mm Incendiary Round.name: 9mm Incendiary Round
9mm Incendiary Round.description: 9mm Incendiary Rounds are used by thePistol. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. Hitting a target will set it ablaze, dealing damage for approximately 20 seconds. Deals 8-11 damage a second to normal targets, and 16-22 damage a second to targets that are weak to fire. 9mm Round.name: 9mm Round
9mm Round.description: The basic ammunition used by thePistols. Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. With the talentPistol Proficiency, Prospectors can craft this ammo at a -25% reduced resource cost. Also, with the talentFreebies, Prospectors have a 5% chance to craft double ammo. The ability to craft double ammo works in tandem, on a successful proc chance, with the reduced resource cost recipe netting a total of six extra rounds of ammunition.

Aluminium Arrow.name: Aluminium Arrow
Aluminium Arrow.description: The Aluminium Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Ammo Casing.name: Ammo Casing
Ammo Casing.description: The Ammo Casing is a vital component used in the crafting of9mm Roundsand7.62mm Rounds.

Black Wolf Arrow.name: Black Wolf Arrow
Black Wolf Arrow.description: The Black Wolf Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 10.

Bone Arrow.name: Bone Arrow
Bone Arrow.description: The Bone Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

Carbon Arrow.name: Carbon Arrow
Carbon Arrow.description: The Carbon Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Carbon Fibre Round Shield.name: Carbon Fibre Round Shield
Carbon Fibre Round Shield.description: The Carbon Fibre Round Shield is crafted at the Forge/Foundry with the following resources:

Carved Wood Narrow Wardrobe.name: Carved Wood Narrow Wardrobe
Carved Wood Narrow Wardrobe.description: Carved Wood Narrow Wardrobe is a decorative narrow wardrobe with 10 inventory slots. It has two build variants available by selecting 'R' when deploying.

Caveworm Arrow.name: Caveworm Arrow
Caveworm Arrow.description: The Caveworm Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Similar to thePoison Arrow, these are helpful in a 'fire and flee' situation. Firing multiple arrows will continue to stack the Poisoned debuff, dealing damage over time.

Cold Steel Arrow.name: Cold Steel Arrow
Cold Steel Arrow.description: The Cold Steel Arrow is ammunition used with aBow, introduced inChapter - New Frontier. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Columbian Mammoth Trophy.name: Columbian Mammoth Trophy
Columbian Mammoth Trophy.description: Columbian Mammoth Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Columbian Mammoth Vestige.name: Columbian Mammoth Vestige
Columbian Mammoth Vestige.description: Columbian Mammoth Vestiges are used at theTrophy Benchto create aColumbian Mammoth Trophy, which can help prospectors complete theBestiary.

Composite Arrow.name: Composite Arrow
Composite Arrow.description: The Composite Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Crude Ammo.name: Crude Ammo
Crude Ammo.description: Crude Ammo is a crude, low-tech ammunition that works with all categories ofPistols.

Decorative Shell.name: Decorative Shell
Decorative Shell.description: The Decorative Shell is an item unlocked by completing theFracturemission. There are two varieties of pottery selectable by 'R'.

Fire Arrow.name: Fire Arrow
Fire Arrow.description: Want to turn that forest filled with bears into an inferno? The fire arrow is your friend. Need a light at the top of that cave? Fire arrow. While not as bright as theFlare Arrow, it will continue burning upon impact. Similar to thePoison Arrow, the Fire Arrow is a DOT upgrade to theStone Arrow, which is helpful when in a 'fire and flee' situation. These arrows cannot be recovered once fired.

Flare Arrow.name: Flare Arrow
Flare Arrow.description: Flare Arrows are used to light up dark areas/cave roofs and can be shot high into the air to illuminate the darkness or to signal fellow Prospectors from a distance. These arrows cannot be recovered once fired.

Flint Arrow.name: Flint Arrow
Flint Arrow.description: The Flint Arrow is ammunition used with aBow. Like bolts and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Inaris \"Aruda\" Arrow Bundle.name: Inaris "Aruda" Arrow Bundle
Inaris \"Aruda\" Arrow Bundle.description: Consuming the Inaris "Aruda" Arrow Bundle will add 25xInaris "Aruda" Arrows to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed arrow bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Arrow bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Inaris \"Biana\" Arrow.name: Inaris "Biana" Arrow

Poison Arrow.description: The Poison Arrow is a damage over time upgrade to theStone Arrow, which is helpful when in a 'fire and flee' situation. DOT effect stacks.

Sandworm Arrow.description: An upgrade to thePoison Arrowthese are helpful in a 'fire and flee' situation. Firing multiple arrows will continue to stack the Wound debuff, decreasing health regeneration of the target by 80%.

Arctic Feet Armor.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade toFur Armor, offering unrivaled cold resistance.

Arctic Vesper Vestige.name: Arctic Vesper Vestige

Armored Saddle.name: Armored Saddle
Armored Saddle.description: The Armored Saddle is a saddle forMountsthat has a medieval aesthetic. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

Armor Attachment Pack.name: Armor Attachment Pack
Armor Attachment Pack.description: Armor Attachment Pack is aTier 3Techneeded for theAlteration Benchthat allows Prospectors to alter their armor pieces withAttachment Packs.

Ashen Drake Vestige.description: Ashen Drake Vestiges are used at theTrophy Benchto create anAshen Drake Trophy, which can help prospectors complete theBestiary.

Bear Vestige.name: Bear Vestige
Bear Vestige.description: Bear Vestiges are used at theTrophy Benchto create aBear Trophy, which can help prospectors complete theBestiary. They are also used at theAdvanced Textiles Bench/Electric Textiles Benchto makeBear Rugs. Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of theWell Rested Buff.

Black Jaguar Vestige.name: Black Jaguar Vestige

Bone Arm Armor.name: Bone Arm Armor
Bone Arm Armor.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as aTier 1armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

Bone Leg Armor.name: Bone Leg Armor
Bone Leg Armor.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as aTier 1armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

Brown Bear Arm Armor.name: Brown Bear Arm Armor
Brown Bear Arm Armor.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade toBone Armor, offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with theCalibrated Grip Attachments andAttack Speed Attachments, further increasing knife attack speed.

Buffalo Vestige.name: Buffalo Vestige

They are also used at theAdvanced Textiles Bench/Electric Textiles Benchto makeBuffalo Rugs. Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of theWell Rested Buff.

First Cohort Envirosuit.name: First Cohort Envirosuit
First Cohort Envirosuit.description: As part of the ICARUS: Supporters Edition (unavailable for purchase), prospectors received an exclusive UDA envirosuit with a built-in water slot – giving an edge to prospectors who dare pursue fortune on the moon's surface. There’s no better way to show your commitment than to wear it with pride. The First Cohort Envirosuit is researched and crafted in theWorkshopon theSpace Station.

Fur Arms Armor.name: Fur Arms Armor
Fur Arms Armor.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade toLeather Armor, offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.

Fur Feet Armor.name: Fur Feet Armor
Fur Feet Armor.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade toLeather Armor, offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It has unique set bonuses for returning damage to the attacker and has one of the highest physical resistances in the game.

Xigo S5 Envirosuit.name: Xigo S5 Envirosuit
Xigo S5 Envirosuit.description: The Xigo S5 Envirosuit is the default Envirosuit automatically equipped in the Prospector's loadout if an envirosuit is not equipped prior to starting a new prospect.

Xigo S5-II Envirosuit.name: Xigo S5-II Envirosuit
Xigo S5-II Envirosuit.description: The Xigo S5-II Envirosuit is the first unlockable envirosuit Prospectors can unlock in theWorkshopon theSpace Station.

Xigo S5-X Envirosuit.name: Xigo S5-X Envirosuit
Xigo S5-X Envirosuit.description: The Xigo S5-X Envirosuit is purchased in theWorkshopon theSpace Station.

Zebra Vestige.name: Zebra Vestige
Zebra Vestige.description: Zebra Vestiges are used at theTrophy Benchto create aZebra Trophy, which can help prospectors complete theBestiary.

Advanced Alteration Bench.name: Advanced Alteration Bench
Advanced Alteration Bench.description: The Advanced Alteration Bench is a late game technology that allows prospectors to create Attachment Packs (Tier 3) and Advanced Attachment Packs (Tier 4) to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools. An active power connection providing at least 1,500electricityto craft Attachment Packs is required. A power connection is not required to add and remove Attachment packs from items.

Advanced Masonry Bench.name: Advanced Masonry Bench
Advanced Masonry Bench.description: The Advanced Masonry Bench enables the construction ofScoria Brick Building PiecesandClay Brick Building Piecesand is able to craft items made theMasonry Benchat a faster rate, but only once the prospector researches the blueprint sets for those building pieces.

Advanced Textiles Bench.name: Advanced Textiles Bench
Advanced Textiles Bench.description: Allows for the crafting of more advancedArmorsets,Cured LeatherandPlatinum Weave. The Advanced Textiles Bench is also able to craft items made at theTextiles Bench, removing the need for multiple benches.

Alteration Bench.name: Alteration Bench
Alteration Bench.description: The Alteration Bench is a mid-to-late game technology that allows Prospectors to create Attachment Packs to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools.

Animal Bed.name: Animal Bed
Animal Bed.description: The Animal Bed serves as a place for juvenile animals to sleep while taming and is required to tame juvenile animals. TamedMountsandPetscan also use the Animal Bed when tired.

Anvil Bench.name: Anvil Bench
Anvil Bench.description: The Anvil Bench is unlocked near the start of theTier 2Tech Tree. It enables the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as theIron PickaxeandSteel Pickaxe. It is also where these tools can be repaired. While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under a severely damaged roof) in storms.

Arctic Chest Armor.name: Arctic Chest Armor
Arctic Chest Armor.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade toFur Armor, offering unrivaled cold resistance.

Art Deco 10-Seater Table.name: Art Deco 10-Seater Table
Art Deco 10-Seater Table.description: The Art Deco 10-Seater Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco 6-Seater Table.name: Art Deco 6-Seater Table
Art Deco 6-Seater Table.description: The Art Deco 6-Seater Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Bed.name: Art Deco Bed
Art Deco Bed.description: The Art Deco Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod. The Art Deco Bed has the best sleep quality of any bed.

Art Deco Dining Chair.name: Art Deco Dining Chair
Art Deco Dining Chair.description: The Art Deco Dining Chair is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Lounge Chair.name: Art Deco Lounge Chair
Art Deco Lounge Chair.description: The Art Deco Lounge Chair is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Round Table.name: Art Deco Round Table
Art Deco Round Table.description: The Art Deco Round Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Sitting Bench.name: Art Deco Sitting Bench
Art Deco Sitting Bench.description: The Art Deco Sitting Bench is an gilded item of significant worth.

Basic Fishing Bench.name: Basic Fishing Bench
Basic Fishing Bench.description: The Basic Fishing Bench is where Prospectors can craft theWooden Fishing Rodand theRefined Wood Fishing Rod, as well as variousLureson the left hand side of the bench. The right side of the bench is used to fillet any fish caught using aFishing Rodor Fishing Trap. Does not require shelter to be used.

Bedroll.name: Bedroll
Bedroll.description: The Bedroll allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered, a campfire/heater/dehumidifier/etc is nearby, and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Sleeping will provide the Well RestedStatus Effect. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bedroll, however if this bedroll is picked up or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to their drop pod.

Black Tusker Animal Bed.name: Black Tusker Animal Bed
Black Tusker Animal Bed.description: The Black Tusker Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a tusker theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Bone Chest Armor.name: Bone Chest Armor
Bone Chest Armor.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as aTier 1armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

Brown Bear Chest Armor.name: Brown Bear Chest Armor
Brown Bear Chest Armor.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade toBone Armor, offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with theCalibrated Grip Attachments andAttack Speed Attachments, further increasing knife attack speed.

Brutalist 10-Seater Table.name: Brutalist 10-Seater Table
Brutalist 10-Seater Table.description: The Brutalist 10-Seater Table seats ten and is mode from concrete, copper nails and glass.

Brutalist 6-Seater Table.name: Brutalist 6-Seater Table
Brutalist 6-Seater Table.description: The Brutalist 6-Seater Table seats six, is mode from concrete, copper nails and glass.

Brutalist Bed.name: Brutalist Bed
Brutalist Bed.description: The Brutalist Bed is mode from concrete and platinum weave, and has an increased sleep quality.

Brutalist Coffee Table.name: Brutalist Coffee Table
Brutalist Coffee Table.description: The Brutalist Coffee Table is mode from concrete, iron and glass.

Brutalist Dining Chair.name: Brutalist Dining Chair
Brutalist Dining Chair.description: The Brutalist Dining Chair seats one and is mode from concrete and leather.

Brutalist Lounge Chair.name: Brutalist Lounge Chair
Brutalist Lounge Chair.description: The Brutalist Lounge Chair is a minimalist chair made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist Octagonal Table.name: Brutalist Octagonal Table
Brutalist Octagonal Table.description: The Brutalist Octagonal Table seats six and is mode from concrete and copper nails.

Brutalist Sitting Bench.name: Brutalist Sitting Bench
Brutalist Sitting Bench.description: The Brutalist Sitting Bench is made soley from concrete and seats two prospectors.

Burlap Animal Bed.name: Burlap Animal Bed
Burlap Animal Bed.description: The Burlap Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a basic theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Carpentry Bench.name: Carpentry Bench
Carpentry Bench.description: While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under severely damaged roof) in storms.

Carved Wood Armchair.name: Carved Wood Armchair
Carved Wood Armchair.description: The Carved Wood Armchair is a decorative item.

Carved Wood Bed.name: Carved Wood Bed
Carved Wood Bed.description: The Carved Wood Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

Carved Wood Chair.name: Carved Wood Chair
Carved Wood Chair.description: The Carved Wood Chair is a decorative chair of two varieties, select R when deploying.

Carved Wood Coffee Table.name: Carved Wood Coffee Table
Carved Wood Coffee Table.description: The Carved Wood Coffee Table is a decorative item with two varieties, select R when deploying.

Carved Wood Large Table.name: Carved Wood Large Table
Carved Wood Large Table.description: The Carved Wood Large Table is a long wood table with room for 10 seats. The item has two build variants that can be selected with the 'R' key when deploying.

Carved Wood Round Table.name: Carved Wood Round Table
Carved Wood Round Table.description: The Carved Wood Round Table is a decorative round wood table.

Carved Wood Sitting Bench.name: Carved Wood Sitting Bench
Carved Wood Sitting Bench.description: The Carved Wood Sitting Bench is a decorative wooden bench that provides seating and a small bonus toCoziness.

Carved Wood Table.name: Carved Wood Table
Carved Wood Table.description: The Carved Wood Table is a decorative table with seating for six and a bonus toCoziness.

Charging Station.name: Charging Station
Charging Station.description: The Charging Station charges basic battery powered devices like theFlashlightand requires 500Wattsto function.

Chemistry Bench.name: Chemistry Bench
Chemistry Bench.description: Grants the Prospector the ability to swiftly createMedicine,Fertilizer,Volatile SubstanceandDistilled Miasmic Coating.

Cloth Chest Armor.name: Cloth Chest Armor
Cloth Chest Armor.description: Cloth Armor, while not being very protective in a fight, provides relatively good protection from the heat in deserts. It also makes traveling slightly quicker.

Composite Chest Armor.name: Composite Chest Armor
Composite Chest Armor.description: Composite Chest Armor is the highest tier of crafted armor in Icarus and thus provides superior protection from wildlife, while providing considerable insulation from the elements.

Concrete Furnace.name: Concrete Furnace
Concrete Furnace.description: Made at theMachining Bench, this Tier 3 furnace allows the smelting of mid-tier ores such asSteel Ingot+Super Cooled IceintoCold Steel IngotsandTitanium OreintoTitanium Ingots.

Cooking Station.name: Cooking Station
Cooking Station.description: The Cooking Station is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way to for prospectors to process raw foods into resources, while also giving the prospector access to a variety of new foods with unique status effects.

Crafting Bench.name: Crafting Bench
Crafting Bench.description: The Crafting Bench allows the prospector to craftTier 2items. While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under severely damaged roof) in storms.

Crumbed Saltwater Fillet.name: Crumbed Saltwater Fillet
Crumbed Saltwater Fillet.description: Crumbed Saltwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cured Leather Chest Armor.name: Cured Leather Chest Armor
Cured Leather Chest Armor.description: Cured Leather Armor is an upgrade toLeather Armor, providing an increase in physical resistance, thermal insulation, and a larger set bonus.

Decoration Bench.name: Decoration Bench
Decoration Bench.description: Although prospectors may not use this bench often, it is required to completeHomestead: Construction.

Electric Carpentry Bench.name: Electric Carpentry Bench
Electric Carpentry Bench.description: The Electric Carpentry Bench allows for manufacturing of refined wood deployables at a faster rate than theCarpentry Bench. Prospectors can use the Electric Carpentry Bench to craft furniture, like an improvedWooden Bed, and storage items like anInterior Wood Cupboard. The Electric Carpentry Bench can also create Interior Wood building pieces.

Electric Furnace.name: Electric Furnace
Electric Furnace.description: The Electric Furnace is the end-game furnace capable of smeltingComposite PasteintoComposites, a material required for mostTier 4blueprints, and can refine all other minerals faster than the lower tier furnaces.

Electric Masonry Bench.name: Electric Masonry Bench
Electric Masonry Bench.description: The Electric Masonry Bench enables the construction ofStone Building PiecesandConcrete Building Piecesat a faster rate than theMasonry BenchandCement Mixer, but only once the Prospector researches the blueprints for building pieces. The Electric Masonry Bench can also craft all building pieces made at theMasonry Bench/Advanced Masonry Bench.

Electric Textiles Bench.name: Electric Textiles Bench
Electric Textiles Bench.description: A power connection providing at least 2,500 ofpoweris required to utilize this bench. Allows for the crafting of more advancedArmorsets and items that can be made at theTextiles BenchandAdvanced Textiles Bench.

Fabricator.name: Fabricator
Fabricator.description: The Fabricator is the late-game crafting bench, it enables the crafting ofWeaponsandToolslike theCombat Knifeand aTitanium Pickaxe. It also enables the creation of power sources, such as theBiofuel Generator, and theRefrigerator.

Forge.name: Forge
Forge.description: The Forge is theTier 3variant of theAnvil Benchthat will allow the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as thePlatinum Pickaxe,Cold Steel Knife, etc and items crafted at theAnvil Bench(Iron Axe,Copper Nails, etc). It is also where these tools can be repaired. Unlike other benches, the Forge can be deployed and used outdoors as it does not require shelter. Can be used indoors or outdoors.

Fried Chunky Vegetables.name: Fried Chunky Vegetables
Fried Chunky Vegetables.description: Fried Chunky Vegetables is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fur Chest Armor.name: Fur Chest Armor
Fur Chest Armor.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade toLeather Armor, offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.

Ghillie Chest Armor.name: Ghillie Chest Armor
Ghillie Chest Armor.description: Ghillie Chest Armor provides protection from the elements while also providing concealment from the keen eyes of prey.

Glassworking Bench.name: Glassworking Bench
Glassworking Bench.description: The Glassworking Bench is a mid-to-late game technology that allows Prospectors to createGlassresources and construction elements, like theGlass WindowandGlass Roof. In addition, Prospectors can create containers for food and beverages, such as theGlass BottleandGlass Jar.

Heated Animal Bed.name: Heated Animal Bed
Heated Animal Bed.description: The Heated Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Heavy Obsidian Chest Armor.name: Heavy Obsidian Chest Armor
Heavy Obsidian Chest Armor.description: Heavy Obsidian Armor is aTier 2armor specialized in heat resistance with a slightly higher physical resistance thanLeather Armorand a major boost in armor durability, great for taking on what the volcanic regions of Prometheus have to offer.

Herbalism Bench.name: Herbalism Bench
Herbalism Bench.description: Allows for the crafting ofMedicinal Pastes and Tonicssuch asAntibiotic Tonicto cure ailments and afflictions.

Hunter Chest Armor.name: Hunter Chest Armor
Hunter Chest Armor.description: An upgrade toGhillie Armorwith over double the physical/exposure resistance and an increase to crouch movement speed when a full set is worn. The ideal armor for hunting that will give any prospector the advantage over wild game.

Industrial Bed.name: Industrial Bed
Industrial Bed.description: The Industrial Bed is made from metal and has an increased sleep quality.

Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed.name: Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed
Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed.description: The Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a Jaguar and Buffalo theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Kitchen Bench.name: Kitchen Bench
Kitchen Bench.description: The Kitchen Bench is a mid/late-game crafting bench that expands on cooking foods and it is also the path for creating more advanced medicines.

Kitchen Storage Block.name: Kitchen Storage Block
Kitchen Storage Block.description: A Kitchen Storage Block made of refined wood and copper nails, use it to store your kitchen essentials. Must be snapped to aKitchen Benchto be placed. It has 40 inventory slots.

Leather Chest Armor.name: Leather Chest Armor
Leather Chest Armor.description: Leather armor may not offer much protection when fighting against Icarus'Fauna, but it offers more physical protection and thermal insulation than itsTier 1counterparts, serving as a decent all-around armor forTier 2.

LM Beastmaster Chest Armor.name: LM Beastmaster Chest Armor
LM Beastmaster Chest Armor.description: The LM Beastmaster Chest Armor is part of theLM Beastmaster Armor Set, which can be unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. The armor set comes with buffs toMountsand tamed creatures.

Machining Bench.name: Machining Bench
Machining Bench.description: Mid-level crafting system made at theCrafting Bench, the Machining Bench provides access toTier 3Blueprints. Prospectors can use it to createDeployablesandFirearms.

Marble Kitchen Bench.name: Marble Kitchen Bench
Marble Kitchen Bench.description: The Marble Kitchen Bench is a late-game crafting bench that expands on cooking foods and contains the recipes that can be found in theCooking Station. Crafts 50% faster than theKitchen Bench. A water connection is not required for the Marble Kitchen Bench to function.

Marble Kitchen Storage.name: Marble Kitchen Storage
Marble Kitchen Storage.description: The Marble Kitchen Storage is used to store kitchen essentials and must be snapped to aKitchen Benchto be placed. The Marble Kitchen Storage has 40 slots.

Masonry Bench.name: Masonry Bench
Masonry Bench.description: The Masonry Bench enables the construction ofStone Building PiecesandScoria Building Pieces, but only once the prospector researches the blueprint sets for those building pieces.

Medicine Bench.name: Medicine Bench
Medicine Bench.description: Allows for the crafting ofMedicinal Pastes and Tonicssuch asAntibiotic Pill,Survival KitsandHealth Recovery Elixirto cure and prevent ailments and afflictions. It can also be used to craftVolatile SubstanceandFertilizer.

MXC Furnace.name: MXC Furnace
MXC Furnace.description: The MXC Furnace is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect. The MXC Furnace functions like a smaller, more lightweightStone Furnace, and allows for processing ofIron Ore,Copper Ore, andSteel Bloominto ingots.

Obsidian Chest Armor.name: Obsidian Chest Armor
Obsidian Chest Armor.description: Obsidian Armor is a sidegrade ofComposite Armor, providing slightly more physical resistance and a substantial bonus to heat resistance.

Plumbed Sink.name: Plumbed Sink
Plumbed Sink.description: The Plumbed Sink is bench that can be connected to other Marble Appliances and, when connected to active water connection, provides a short buff when interacted with. The Buff increases crafting speed, movement speed, health regeneration, and reduced water and food consumption. 250 units ofWateris required for the Plumbed Sink to function.

Portable Beacon.name: Portable Beacon
Portable Beacon.description: When deployed, the Portable Beacon will display a map marker that is visible on the map and compass, which is helpful for marking locations of caves/bases/predator spawns/or anything else a Prospector wishes to mark. When interacting with the Portable Beacon, Prospectors can choose from a list of available icons and colors to customize the icon displayed. Must be placed outdoors.

Portable Biofuel Generator.name: Portable Biofuel Generator
Portable Biofuel Generator.description: The Portable Biofuel Generator generatesElectricitywhen supplied with biofuel from aBiofuel Can.

Portable Biofuel Tank.name: Portable Biofuel Tank
Portable Biofuel Tank.description: Portable Biofuel Tank is used forBiofuelstorage. It is either filled at theBiofuel ComposterorElectric Composter.

Portable Icebox Backpack.name: Portable Icebox Backpack
Portable Icebox Backpack.description: A handy backpack to prevent your food from spoiling on long journeys. Will run for 1 hour on a full charge. Can be recharged at aCharging Station.

Portable Water Tank.name: Portable Water Tank
Portable Water Tank.description: Portable Water Tank is a deployable that can be connected to a water network once placed to store 150,000 of water and can output 1,000 water per second to keep the network operational. It is the equivalent to aWater Barrelwith having half of the storage, but it can be picked up into your character's Backpack/Equipment Slot (G).

Ranching Station.name: Ranching Station
Ranching Station.description: The Ranching Station allows the prospector to craft variousTier 2equipment to use and maintain mounts and pets. This includes severalFood Troughs/Water Troughs,Animal Beds,Saddles/Carts,Animal Feed, and otherRanching Deployables. Must be placed outside.

Regent Animal Bed.name: Regent Animal Bed
Regent Animal Bed.description: The Regent Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Repair Bench.name: Repair Bench
Repair Bench.description: The Repair Bench has the ability to repair all items you’re wearing or have placed on the bench with a single click, regardless of where they were crafted. When combined with a power connection (1,500electricity) it can also repairTier 4and Orbital Workshop items. To repair Orbital Workshop Items, aWorkshop Repair Kitis required.

Roast Vegetables.name: Roast Vegetables
Roast Vegetables.description: Roast Vegetables is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Royal Animal Bed.name: Royal Animal Bed
Royal Animal Bed.description: The Royal Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Rustic Armchair.name: Rustic Armchair
Rustic Armchair.description: The Rustic Armchair seats one prospector

Rustic Bed.name: Rustic Bed
Rustic Bed.description: The Rustic Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

Rustic Coffee Table.name: Rustic Coffee Table
Rustic Coffee Table.description: The Rustic Coffee Table allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Dining Chair.name: Rustic Dining Chair
Rustic Dining Chair.description: The Rustic Dining Chair a rustic chair that seats one prospector.

Rustic Large Table.name: Rustic Large Table
Rustic Large Table.description: The Rustic Large Table is a simple long wooden table.

Rustic Round Table.name: Rustic Round Table
Rustic Round Table.description: The Rustic Round Table is a simple wooden table.

Rustic Sitting Bench.name: Rustic Sitting Bench
Rustic Sitting Bench.description: The Rustic Sitting Bench seats two prospectors.

Rustic Table.name: Rustic Table
Rustic Table.description: The Rustic Table is a simple wooden table.

Salting Station.name: Salting Station
Salting Station.description: The Salting Station is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way to for Prospectors to preserve foods usingSalt. Once a food is salted, it will receive the Preserved modifier, increasing spoil time by 100%. Salting a food item will reset its spoil timer, even if the item is nearly spoiled. This technique can be used to further extend the spoilage.

Sandworm Chest Armor.name: Sandworm Chest Armor
Sandworm Chest Armor.description: Sandworm Chest Armor is made from the scales dropped from aSandworm. Provides exceptional heat protection with the added bonus of poison resistance when worn with a full set ofSandworm Armor.

Scorpion Chest Armor.name: Scorpion Chest Armor
Scorpion Chest Armor.description: Scorpion Chest Armor is aTier 2crafted armor requiring aTextiles Bench; however, it is difficult to acquire due to the challenge of defeatingHusk: Exterminationand requiringScorpion Carapace. It has unique set bonuses for returning damage to the attacker and has one of the highest physical resistances in the game.

Skinning Bench.name: Skinning Bench
Skinning Bench.description: The Skinning Bench is used to process, the small to medium carcasses, of theFaunafound on Icarus. While the yields from the skinning bench differ from skinning wildlife withKnives, most notably is the ability to always obtain rarer cuts of meat from fauna such asRaw Stringy Meat.

Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed.name: Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed
Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed.description: The Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a snow leopard theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Sprinters Animal Feed.name: Sprinters Animal Feed
Sprinters Animal Feed.description: Sprinters Animal Feed is aAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Sprinters Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Sprinters Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Stone Furnace.name: Stone Furnace
Stone Furnace.description: The Stone Furnace is used for smelting metals such asIron Ore,Copper Ore, orSteel Bloom. Will take damage in storms if left un-sheltered.

Striker Terrenus Animal Bed.name: Striker Terrenus Animal Bed
Striker Terrenus Animal Bed.description: The Striker Terrenus Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has an... unsettling theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Textiles Bench.name: Textiles Bench
Textiles Bench.description: Allows for the crafting of variousArmorsets, such as theLeather Armor Set,Fur Armor Set,Ghillie Armor Set,Sandworm Armor Set, and theScorpion Armor Set. Items like theBasic Riding Saddle,Simple Creature DeterrentandRopecan also be made at the Textiles Bench.

Trophy Bench.name: Trophy Bench
Trophy Bench.description: The Trophy Bench allows prospectors to createTrophiesfrom variousVestiges, for eventual display around a building or outpost.

Vegetable Oil.name: Vegetable Oil
Vegetable Oil.description: Vegetable Oil is an intermediary resource used to createBiofuel,Cured Leather, aSubmachine Gunand variousFoodrecipes.

Vegetable Pie.name: Vegetable Pie
Vegetable Pie.description: Vegetable Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Vegetable Roll.name: Vegetable Roll
Vegetable Roll.description: Vegetable Roll is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Wayfarer Chest Armor.name: Wayfarer Chest Armor
Wayfarer Chest Armor.description: Wayfarer Chest Armor is a mid-gameTier 3crafted armor which can aid prospectors traveling through the Deserts on Icarus.

Wolfskin Animal Bed.name: Wolfskin Animal Bed
Wolfskin Animal Bed.description: The Wolfskin Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a wolf theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Wooden Bed.name: Wooden Bed
Wooden Bed.description: The Wooden Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

Wooden Chair.name: Wooden Chair
Wooden Chair.description: A Wooden Chair made of refined wood and copper nails.

Wood Table.name: Wood Table
Wood Table.description: The Wood Table is a decorative item that can be used for deployables like theMortar and Pestleand provides a bonus toCoziness.

Zebra Animal Bed.name: Zebra Animal Bed
Zebra Animal Bed.description: The Zebra Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a zebra theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

Aluminium Beam.name: Aluminium Beam
Aluminium Beam.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

Aluminium Door.name: Aluminium Door
Aluminium Door.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

Aluminium Floor.name: Aluminium Floor
Aluminium Floor.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

Aluminium Floor Trapdoor.name: Aluminium Floor Trapdoor
Aluminium Floor Trapdoor.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

Aluminium Halfpieces.name: Aluminium Halfpieces
Aluminium Halfpieces.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

Aluminium Halfpitches.name: Aluminium Halfpitches
Aluminium Halfpitches.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

Aluminium Ladder.name: Aluminium Ladder

Concrete Beam.name: Concrete Beam
Concrete Beam.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

Dirt Corner.name: Dirt Corner
Dirt Corner.description: Dirt Corners are aTier 1buildable that are used in tandem withDirt Ramps, allowing for the creation of rounded ramps. Due to the nature of its building material, Dirt Corners must be attached to the terrain when placed; failure to do so will result in the collapse of the building piece.

Dirt Foundation.name: Dirt Foundation
Dirt Foundation.description: Dirt Foundations are aTier 1buildable that serves as an alternative toThatch Beams/Wood Beamsthat provides a more natural look to structures. Due to the nature of its building material, Dirt Foundations must be attached to the terrain when placed; failure to do so will result in the collapse of the building piece.

Dirt Ramp.name: Dirt Ramp
Dirt Ramp.description: Dirt Ramps are aTier 1buildable that serves as an alternative toThatch Ramps/Wood Rampsthat provides a more natural look to structures. Due to the nature of its building material, Dirt Ramps must be attached to the terrain when placed; failure to do so will result in the collapse of the building piece.

Elegant Curtain Window.name: Elegant Curtain Window

Glass Beam.name: Glass Beam
Glass Beam.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.

Glass Door.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.

Can be crafted as Reinforced Glass, increasing resistance to weather up to the level of Stone building peices and increasing HP from 500 to 2500.

Stone Beam.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

Stone Brick Beam.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

Thatch Beam.name: Thatch Beam
Thatch Beam.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different orientations, hold R while holding a Thatch Beam (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Door.name: Thatch Door
Thatch Door.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Can be attached to door frames (hold R while holding a Wall Building Piece and select the door frame variant from the radial menu).

Thatch Floor.name: Thatch Floor
Thatch Floor.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For the trapdoor floor variant, hold R while holding a Thatch Floor and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Halfpieces.name: Thatch Halfpieces
Thatch Halfpieces.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Halfpiece (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Halfpitches.name: Thatch Halfpitches
Thatch Halfpitches.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding Thatch Halfpitches (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Ladder.name: Thatch Ladder
Thatch Ladder.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and best used as temporary shelters while away from any 'Main Base' the prospectors may have established. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Thatch ladders cannot be snapped to trapdoor floors.

Thatch Railing.name: Thatch Railing
Thatch Railing.description: The Thatch Railing is part of theThatch Building Trim Set, which is learned in theTier 1Tech Tree after unlocking theThatch Building Base Set.

Thatch Roof.name: Thatch Roof
Thatch Roof.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers.For the Ramp/Stairs variant, hold R while holding a Thatch Roof(more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Roof Corner.name: Thatch Roof Corner
Thatch Roof Corner.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Roof Corner (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Trapdoor.name: Thatch Trapdoor
Thatch Trapdoor.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best suited as emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Attaches to floors with trapdoor holes (hold R while holding a floor building piece and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel).

Thatch Wall.name: Thatch Wall
Thatch Wall.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For window/doorway variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Wall (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Wall Angled.name: Thatch Wall Angled
Thatch Wall Angled.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Wall Angled (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

Thatch Window.name: Thatch Window
Thatch Window.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Attaches to window frames (hold R while holding a wall building piece and select the Window Frame variant from the radial wheel).

Wall Torch.name: Wall Torch
Wall Torch.description: Wall lighting for a prospector's base. Provides limited heat. Will not be damaged by storms if placed outside.

Wood Beam.name: Wood Beam
Wood Beam.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood beams require another structure for adjacent 'snapping' and seem to apply 'well stabilized' to a larger area than theThatch Beam.

Wood Door.name: Wood Door
Wood Door.description: Wood Door is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

Wood Floor.name: Wood Floor
Wood Floor.description: Wood Floor is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

Wood Roof.name: Wood Roof
Wood Roof.description: Wood Roof is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

Wood Roof Corner.name: Wood Roof Corner
Wood Roof Corner.description: Wood Roof Corner is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

Wood Trapdoor.name: Wood Trapdoor
Wood Trapdoor.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Attaches to floors with trapdoor holes (hold R while holding a floor piece and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel).

Wood Wall.name: Wood Wall
Wood Wall.description: Wood Wall is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

Wood Wall Angled.name: Wood Wall Angled
Wood Wall Angled.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood wall angles may be snapped into existing floors or walls such asWood Wall. Holding 'R' while placing the angled wood wall for additional placement styles or directionality.

Wood Wall Fortification.name: Wood Wall Fortification
Wood Wall Fortification.description: The Wood Wall Fortification serves as large wall that can attachWood Spikes Fortificationsto fend off the predators of Icarus. Similar toMedium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Wall Fortification does not take damage during storms.

Wood Window.name: Wood Window
Wood Window.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood Windows may be snapped into walls such asWood Wallthat have been placed in 'window' configuration. Holding 'R' while placing aWood Wall, for example, allows for additional placement styles, such as the window frame.

Advanced Fishing Trap.name: Advanced Fishing Trap
Advanced Fishing Trap.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Trap. Though aLureis not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching a rarer type of fish. To attach a lure to the Advanced Fishing Trap, inspect the trap by pressing 'F' and drag the lure into the dedicated lure slot.

Basic Dried Meat.name: Basic Dried Meat
Basic Dried Meat.description: Basic Dried Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Basic Fishing Rod.name: Basic Fishing Rod
Basic Fishing Rod.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view thispage.

Basic Fishing Trap.name: Basic Fishing Trap
Basic Fishing Trap.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Trap. Though aLureis not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching a rarer type of fish. To attach a lure to the Basic Fishing Trap, inspect the trap by pressing 'F' and drag the lure into the dedicated lure slot.

Berry Farming Packet.name: Berry Farming Packet
Berry Farming Packet.description: The Berry Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Berry seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Berry Jam.name: Berry Jam
Berry Jam.description: Berry Jam is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Berry Jam,Strawberry JamandPickled Carrot, does not spoil and is therefore a valuable food for long-term storage.

Berry & Seed Bar.name: Berry & Seed Bar
Berry & Seed Bar.description: Full of energy for long hikes, long lasting effects and easily crafted.

Berry Smoked Saltwater Fillet.name: Berry Smoked Saltwater Fillet
Berry Smoked Saltwater Fillet.description: Berry Smoked Saltwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Bread.name: Bread
Bread.description: Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Bread Dough.name: Bread Dough
Bread Dough.description: Bread Dough is the precursor to the mid/late-gameFoodBread. Bread Dough will eventually decay, but can be preserved in anIce Box,Refrigerator, orDeep Freeze.

Caramel Berry Tart.name: Caramel Berry Tart
Caramel Berry Tart.description: Caramel Berry Tart is late-gameFoodthat when consumed provides a considerable boost to stamina, speed, resistance to cave sickness and a chance to mine additional stone.

Cocoa Smoked Soft Meat.name: Cocoa Smoked Soft Meat
Cocoa Smoked Soft Meat.description: Cocoa Smoked Soft Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Bacon.name: Cooked Bacon
Cooked Bacon.description: Cooked Bacon is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Fatty T-Bone.name: Cooked Fatty T-Bone
Cooked Fatty T-Bone.description: Cooked Fatty T-Bone is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Gamey Meat.name: Cooked Gamey Meat
Cooked Gamey Meat.description: Cooked Gamey Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Giant Steak.name: Cooked Giant Steak
Cooked Giant Steak.description: Cooked Giant Steak is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Meat.name: Cooked Meat
Cooked Meat.description: Cooked Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Soft Meat.name: Cooked Soft Meat
Cooked Soft Meat.description: Cooked Soft Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked Stringy Meat.name: Cooked Stringy Meat
Cooked Stringy Meat.description: Cooked Stringy Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cooked White Meat.name: Cooked White Meat
Cooked White Meat.description: Cooked White Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Gamey Meat.name: Dried Gamey Meat
Dried Gamey Meat.description: Dried Gamey Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Soft Meat.name: Dried Soft Meat
Dried Soft Meat.description: Dried Soft Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Stringy Meat.name: Dried Stringy Meat
Dried Stringy Meat.description: Dried Stringy Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried White Meat.name: Dried White Meat
Dried White Meat.description: Dried White Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Electronic Food Trough.name: Electronic Food Trough
Electronic Food Trough.description: AllFood Troughshave an allow list for nearby animals that can be accessed by pressing 'X'. To change which animals can eat from a specific food trough, select the animals permitted to eat from the food trough and select "Allowlist-Only Interaction". By default, all nearby animals can eat from food troughs.

Fisher's Module.name: Fisher's Module
Fisher's Module.description: This module increases the user's ability to catchUnique Fishand, somehow, increases the quality of caught fish. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Fisher's Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit, which will further increasing the user's ability to fish and become the Master Angler they wish to be.

Fish Chunks.name: Fish Chunks
Fish Chunks.description: Fish Chunks are added to the Prospector's inventory after looting the carcass of a fish. Fish caught using a Fishing Trap or Fishing Rod can be converted into Fish Chunks as well. Fish Chunks can be cooked in aCampfire, or used in other dishes such asFreshwater Fillet CurryorCrumbed Saltwater Fillet. Right-click a Freshwater/Saltwater fish to convert it intoFish Chunks.

Fish Chunk Stew.name: Fish Chunk Stew
Fish Chunk Stew.description: Fish Chunk Stew is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fish Pie.name: Fish Pie
Fish Pie.description: Fish Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fish Trophy Mount.name: Fish Trophy Mount
Fish Trophy Mount.description: The Fish Trophy Mount can be used to display impressive catches with details of the quality, weight, and length of the fish shown. When holding down R, Prospectors can choose between 3 different variants. Fish stored in the Fish Trophy Mount will not spoil. All Fish obtained using aFishing Rodor Fishing Trap can be placed in the Fish Trophy Mount.

Flatbread.name: Flatbread
Flatbread.description: Flatbread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Flatbread Dough.name: Flatbread Dough
Flatbread Dough.description: Flatbread Dough is the precursor to the mid/late-gameFoodFlatbread. Flatbread Dough will eventually decay, but can be preserved in anIce Box,Refrigerator, orDeep Freeze.

Food Consumption Paste.name: Food Consumption Paste
Food Consumption Paste.description: In-game description:An organic confection that arrests hunger for a limited time.In-game flavor text:Just because it's organic, doesn't mean it's good for you.

Food Trough.name: Food Trough
Food Trough.description: The Food Trough is a basic trough used to feedMounts/Petsand is recommended if prospectors wish to idly tame a juvenile. Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

Freshwater Fish Fillet.name: Freshwater Fish Fillet
Freshwater Fish Fillet.description: Freshwater Fish Fillet is is the result of filleting a Freshwater Fish at aBasic Fishing Bench. While eating Freshwater Fish Fillet will replenish a small amount ofHunger, there is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

Fried Fish Chunks.name: Fried Fish Chunks
Fried Fish Chunks.description: Fried Fish Chunks is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Glass Food Trough.name: Glass Food Trough
Glass Food Trough.description: The Glass Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to theFood Troughand allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to theLarge Food Trough. Glass Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat.name: Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat
Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat.description: Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Large Food Trough.name: Large Food Trough
Large Food Trough.description: The Large Food Trough is a slight upgrade to theFood Troughthat allows for multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously. Large Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

Meat Pie.name: Meat Pie
Meat Pie.description: Meat Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Metal Food Trough.name: Metal Food Trough
Metal Food Trough.description: The Metal Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to theFood Troughand allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to theLarge Food Trough. Metal Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

Mixed Berries.name: Mixed Berries
Mixed Berries.description: Mixed Berries is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Mushroom Soup.name: Mushroom Soup
Mushroom Soup.description: Mushroom Soup is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Mushroom Soup, which increases maximumHealthand improvesStaminaregeneration.

Potato Bread.name: Potato Bread
Potato Bread.description: Potato Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Prime Meat Attachment.name: Prime Meat Attachment
Prime Meat Attachment.description: Prime Meat Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Pumpkin Bread.name: Pumpkin Bread
Pumpkin Bread.description: Pumpkin Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Raw Bacon.name: Raw Bacon
Raw Bacon.description: Raw meat can be obtained by skinningWild Boarwith aKnife. While eating raw food will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

Raw Chicken.name: Raw Chicken
Raw Chicken.description: Raw Chicken can be obtained from the carcass of a once cryogenically frozenChickenthat can be purchased from theWorkshop.

Raw Copper Lamp.name: Raw Copper Lamp
Raw Copper Lamp.description: The Raw Copper Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Raw Fatty T-Bone.name: Raw Fatty T-Bone
Raw Fatty T-Bone.description: Raw Fatty T-Bone can be obtained by Skinning bears with aKnife.

Raw Gamey Meat.name: Raw Gamey Meat
Raw Gamey Meat.description: Raw Gamey Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Gamey Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

Raw Giant Steak.name: Raw Giant Steak
Raw Giant Steak.description: Raw Giant Steak can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Giant Steak will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

Raw Gold Lamp.name: Raw Gold Lamp
Raw Gold Lamp.description: The Raw Gold Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Raw Meat.name: Raw Meat
Raw Meat.description: Raw meat can be obtained by skinning animals with aKnife. While eating raw meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

Raw Oxite Lamp.name: Raw Oxite Lamp
Raw Oxite Lamp.description: The Raw Oxite Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Raw Soft Meat.name: Raw Soft Meat
Raw Soft Meat.description: Raw Soft Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Soft Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

Raw Stringy Meat.name: Raw Stringy Meat
Raw Stringy Meat.description: Raw Stringy Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Stringy Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

Raw White Meat.name: Raw White Meat
Raw White Meat.description: Eating Raw White Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

Refined Wood Fishing Rod.name: Refined Wood Fishing Rod
Refined Wood Fishing Rod.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view thispage.

Rhubarb Stew.name: Rhubarb Stew
Rhubarb Stew.description: Rhubarb Stew is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Rotten Meat Lure.name: Rotten Meat Lure
Rotten Meat Lure.description: The Rotten Meat Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Rotten Meat Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Rustic Food Trough.name: Rustic Food Trough
Rustic Food Trough.description: The Rustic Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to theFood Troughand allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to theLarge Food Trough. Rustic Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

Saltwater Fish Fillet.name: Saltwater Fish Fillet
Saltwater Fish Fillet.description: Saltwater Fish Fillet is is the result of filleting a Saltwater Fish at aBasic Fishing Bench. While eating Saltwater Fish Fillet will replenish a small amount ofHunger, there is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

Seed Bread.name: Seed Bread
Seed Bread.description: Seed Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Spoiled Meat.name: Spoiled Meat
Spoiled Meat.description: Spoiled Meat is a byproduct ofRaw Meatthat has been allowed to go rancid. Can be used to make a variety of items, primarilyPoison Paste. Requires theYou Gonna Eat That?talent for Spoiled Meat to become consumable.

Stew.name: Stew
Stew.description: Stew is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Strawberries & Cream.name: Strawberries & Cream
Strawberries & Cream.description: Strawberries & Cream is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Strawberry.name: Strawberry
Strawberry.description: Strawberry is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Strawberry Farming Packet.name: Strawberry Farming Packet
Strawberry Farming Packet.description: The Strawberry Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Strawberry seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Strawberry Hard Candy.name: Strawberry Hard Candy
Strawberry Hard Candy.description: Strawberry Hard Candy is a consumable food that provides a quick boost of movement speed.

Strawberry Jam.name: Strawberry Jam
Strawberry Jam.description: Strawberry Jam is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Strawberry Jam,Berry JamandPickled Carrot, do not spoil and is therefore a valuable food for long-term storage.

Sweetcorn Soup.name: Sweetcorn Soup
Sweetcorn Soup.description: Sweetcorn Soup is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Tomato Soup.name: Tomato Soup
Tomato Soup.description: Tomato Soup is a consumableFoodcrafted fromTomatoesandWater. AsTomatoesare only found onPrometheus, this recipe requires the New Frontiers DLC to obtain the ingredients.

Volatile Raw Exotics.name: Volatile Raw Exotics
Volatile Raw Exotics.description: While theExoticsprospectors found onOlympusandStyxwere originally believed to be the only known variation, the UDA has made a remarkable discovery. This unstable variant is different and appears to have an impact on the local flora not seen before.

Wild Berry.name: Wild Berry
Wild Berry.description: Wild Berry are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenish bothHungerandThirst.

Wooden Fishing Rod.name: Wooden Fishing Rod
