Wooden Fishing Rod.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view thispage.

Antibiotic Paste.name: Antibiotic Paste
Antibiotic Paste.description: Antibiotic Paste reduces the duration of bacterial infections like food poisoning and theCave Sicknessdebuff from caves by 50% upon consumption.

Antibiotic Pill.name: Antibiotic Pill
Antibiotic Pill.description: Antibiotic Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments such asCave Sickness,Infected Wounds, andFood Poisoning.

Antibiotic Tonic.name: Antibiotic Tonic
Antibiotic Tonic.description: Used alone to cure infections such asCave Sickness,Infected Wound, andFood poisoning, or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylacticAntibiotic Pill.

Anti-Parasitic Paste.name: Anti-Parasitic Paste
Anti-Parasitic Paste.description: Anti-Parasitic Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in theTier 1tech tree. Reduces the duration of theParasitesdebuff upon consumption.

Anti-Poison Paste.name: Anti-Poison Paste
Anti-Poison Paste.description: Anti-Poison Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in the tier 1 tech tree. Reduces the duration ofPoisonfrom critters like theVenomous Fishor theCaveworm.

Basic Bandage.name: Basic Bandage
Basic Bandage.description: Basic Bandage is used to heal Wound and Exotic WoundStatus Effects.

Blood Thinning Paste.name: Blood Thinning Paste
Blood Thinning Paste.description: Blood Thinning Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in theTier 1tech tree. Reduces the duration ofConcussionsandContusionswhen you're unlucky enough to kiss a falling tree.

Carbon Paste.name: Carbon Paste
Carbon Paste.description: Carbon Paste is a crafted resource meant to be smelted in aConcrete FurnaceorElectric Furnaceto makeCarbon Fiberand is a critical component inTier 4crafting.

Composite Paste.name: Composite Paste
Composite Paste.description: Composite Paste is an end-game crafted resource which can be smelted intoCompositesinside of theElectric Furnace.

Cooling Bandage.name: Cooling Bandage
Cooling Bandage.description: The Cooling Bandage is used to heal Heatstroke, Heat Exhaustion and Exotic OverheatStatus Effects. If the Prospector's core temperature is still extremely high, the cooling bandage will not remove these debuffs.

Cured Leather.name: Cured Leather
Cured Leather.description: Cured Leather is a crafted resource used in variousTier 3ArmorsandTools. Below is a list of armors that use Cured Leather:

base_recipe.crafted_at:
Crafted at
 Drying Rack Smoker Advanced Textiles Bench

Cured Leather Lure.name: Cured Leather Lure
Cured Leather Lure.description: The Cured Leather Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Cured Leather Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Health Buff Paste.name: Health Buff Paste
Health Buff Paste.description: In-game description:An organic preparation that temporarily increases health.In-game flavor text:Like so many things on Icarus, the exact ingredients would probably render this concoction illegal on Earth.

Health Regeneration Paste.name: Health Regeneration Paste
Health Regeneration Paste.description: In-game description:A herbal confection that speeds healing.In-game flavor text:The lily's high concentration of bioactive ingredients is thought to inhibit the reuptake of certain cytochromes, briefly flooding your body with oxidating enzymes.

Health Restoration Paste.name: Health Restoration Paste
Health Restoration Paste.description: In-game description:An organic fusion that restores health.In-game flavor text:The combination of Icarus's unique conditions and genetic adjustments to plant life has seen the addition of 'useful' methyl chains to many previously innocuous plant-based preparations.

Heat Bandage.name: Heat Bandage
Heat Bandage.description: Heat Bandage is used to heal Frostbite, Frosty and Exotic ChillStatus Effects. If the Prospector's core temperature is still freezing, the heat bandage will not remove these debuffs.

Oxygen Buff Paste.name: Oxygen Buff Paste
Oxygen Buff Paste.description: In-game description:A natural concoction that increases available oxygen.In-game flavor text:Your parents are a long way from here. What you do with your body is your business.

Oxygen Consumption Paste.name: Oxygen Consumption Paste
Oxygen Consumption Paste.description: In-game description:A natural beta blocker.In-game flavor text:This preparation reduces the heart rate, dropping oxygen consumption temporarily.

Oxygen Restoration Paste.name: Oxygen Restoration Paste
Oxygen Restoration Paste.description: In-game description:An organic co-factor that rapidly restores oxygen.In-game flavor text:Helper molecule

Poison Paste.name: Poison Paste
Poison Paste.description: Poison Paste is used for making a variety of items, such as medicines likeAnti-Poison Pillor ammo likePoison Arrow.

Shengong \"Yeying\" Bandage.name: Shengong "Yeying" Bandage
Shengong \"Yeying\" Bandage.description: The Shengong "Yeying" Bandage is an overly pricedBasic Bandagepurchased from the Workshop that will remove theBleedingmodifier when consumed.

Stamina Buff Paste.name: Stamina Buff Paste
Stamina Buff Paste.description: In-game description:A herbal concoction, temporarily increasing stamina.In-game flavor text:While lacking some of the pharmaceutical refinements, this paste produces similar physiological affects to the 'wakers' once offered to long haul space pilots.

Stamina Consumption Paste.name: Stamina Consumption Paste
Stamina Consumption Paste.description: In-game description:A biotic compound that slows stamina loss temporarily.In-game flavor text:The time-jarring effects of exotics find their influence in many subtle, poorly understood ways on Icarus.

Stamina Regeneration Paste.name: Stamina Regeneration Paste
Stamina Regeneration Paste.description: In-game description:An organic stimulant that accelerates stamina recovery.In-game flavor text:A herbal preparation that acts rapidly on the sympathetic nervous system, increasing noradrenergic activity.

Stamina Restoration Paste.name: Stamina Restoration Paste
Stamina Restoration Paste.description: In-game description:A natural stimulant that restores lost stamina.In-game flavor text:As countless athletes, party-goers and would-be mystics have noted, the line between natural stimulant and highly addictive narcotic is arbitrary, at best.

Water Consumption Paste.name: Water Consumption Paste
Water Consumption Paste.description: In-game description:A natural preparation, temporarily reducing the body's need for water.In-game flavor text:The key word here is 'temporarily'.

Composite Dropship Recall Beacon.name: Composite Dropship Recall Beacon
Composite Dropship Recall Beacon.description: The Composite Dropship Recall Beacon will fire a flare that calls the Prospectors dropship to that location when thrown, which can either be used for immediate extraction or left there for use later on. Multiple Recall Beacons can be used per session, however, these are one-use items, so use them carefully. Items stored in the dropships inventory will not be lost when the dropship is called, allowing Prospectors to transport equipment/resources over large distances.

Makeshift Landmine.name: Makeshift Landmine
Makeshift Landmine.description: Prospectorsonmounts and mounts themselves do not trigger Landmines. Prospectors, however, can trigger and detonate Landmines with a Yellow/Red indicator. All Landmines can be picked up and disarmed, regardless of their current state. Press and hold X to pickup and disarm Landmines.Note:once triggered, Makeshift Landmines will detonate if a Prospector/animal (excluding mounts) is nearby. They can be picked up and disarmed, but Prospectors run the risk of detonating the Landmine.

Miner's Module.name: Miner's Module
Miner's Module.description: This module is theWorkshopequivalent of theSupplemental Respiration Attachment, with the added damage bonus toCaveworms. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Miner's Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase benefits received from the modules.

Prototype Trail Beacon.name: Prototype Trail Beacon
Prototype Trail Beacon.description: The Prototype Trail Beacon is a small portable self-powered beacon that is deployed with thePrototype Trail Beacon Toolto form a breadcrumb trail in the uncharted areas of theNull Sector RegiononPrometheus.

Prototype Trail Beacon Tool.name: Prototype Trail Beacon Tool
Prototype Trail Beacon Tool.description: The Prototype Trail Beacon Tool is a handheld device used to place a breadcrumb trail ofPrototype Trail Beaconswhen exploring theNull Sector Regionon thePrometheusmap.

Scorpion Pincer Trap.name: Scorpion Pincer Trap
Scorpion Pincer Trap.description: Scorpion Pincer Traps are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment. The recipe blueprint to craft this defensive trap is only unlocked after completing the prospectCarapace: Research. The blueprint unlocks account-wide once the mission is completed.

Snare Trap.name: Snare Trap
Snare Trap.description: The Snare Trap is a deployable item used to trap and tame certain animals on Icarus. It must be filled with suitableAnimal Baitand placed in an area to attract the desired animal.

base_recipe.crafted_at: Craft Baits at the Ranching Station

Acidic Glands.name: Acidic Glands
Acidic Glands.description: Acidic Glands can be taken to anOrganic Residue Cleanserto be turned into 5xAnimal Fat. Hazardous when carried in small amounts, deadly when carried in large quantities/with several other Miasmic items. Despite the risk, Acidic Glands is an excellent source ofAnimal Fat.

AdLift Module.name: AdLift Module
AdLift Module.description: This module increases the user's weight capacity by 15% when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple AdLift Modules may be equipped if the prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the amount the user can carry.

Advanced Aquarium.name: Advanced Aquarium
Advanced Aquarium.description: The Advanced Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Advanced Aquarium will not spoil so long as it is connected to a power network providing at least 1,000 units ofPowerand a water network providing at least 500 units ofWater. The Advanced Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. The Advanced Aquarium can store 4 fish.

Advanced Battery Rack.name: Advanced Battery Rack
Advanced Battery Rack.description: The Advanced Battery Rack is a power-storing device that must be placed indoors. It can store up to 6,000kWs ofpowerand can charge/output power at a max rate of 10,000 Watts per second.

Advanced Creature Deterrent.name: Advanced Creature Deterrent
Advanced Creature Deterrent.description: While useful for protecting Prospectors from predators, the Advanced Creature Deterrent also prevents the spawning ofFaunaso be aware that deer, pronghorns, rabbits, chamois, or other animals will not spawn within the indicated radius.

Advanced Storm Visor Attachment.name: Advanced Storm Visor Attachment
Advanced Storm Visor Attachment.description: The Advanced Storm Visor Attachment is an end-game item available once the prospector has unlocked theAdvanced Armor Attachment Packsin the Tier 4 Tech Tree.

Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachm.name: Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachment
Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachm.description: The Advanced Supplemental Filtration Attachment is an armor alteration that provides resistance to poison and reduced water consumption.

Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attach.name: Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attachment
Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attach.description: The Advanced Supplemental Respiration Attachment is an end-game item available once the prospector has unlocked theAdvanced Armor Attachment Packsin the Tier 4 Tech Tree.

Advanced Tool Attachment Pack.name: Advanced Tool Attachment Pack
Advanced Tool Attachment Pack.description: The Advanced Tool Attachment Pack is aTier 4item that allows Prospectors to alter their tools with additional bonuses. Similar toTool Attachment Pack, both can be applied at anAlteration BenchorAdvanced Alteration Bench.

Aerodynamic Attachment.name: Aerodynamic Attachment
Aerodynamic Attachment.description: Aerodynamic Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Alpha Wolf Trophy.name: Alpha Wolf Trophy
Alpha Wolf Trophy.description: Alpha Wolf Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Animal Bait.name: Animal Bait
Animal Bait.description: Animal Bait is used to lure random predators when left in an open area. The blueprint is unlocked account-wide after completing the prospectWet Work: Extermination. Stacks up to 5.

Animal Fat.name: Animal Fat
Animal Fat.description: Animal fat is produced from the rendering down of raw meat and is used inCookingto make late-gameFoodssuch asPastry,Fried Chunky Vegetablesand,Freshwater Fillet Curry. It is used to create and power theLantern.

base_recipe.crafted_at:
Crafted at
 Cooking Station Kitchen Bench

Animal Healthbar Module.name: Animal Healthbar Module
Animal Healthbar Module.description: This module allows the wearer to see creature alert level and health when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot. The Animal Healthbar Module is researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshopand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect.

Animal Highlighting Module.name: Animal Highlighting Module
Animal Highlighting Module.description: Animal Highlighting Module is researched and created on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Equip in anEnvirosuitModule Slot after dropping down for a prospect.

Antelope Trophy.name: Antelope Trophy
Antelope Trophy.description: Antelope Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Anti-Parasitic Pill.name: Anti-Parasitic Pill
Anti-Parasitic Pill.description: Anti-Parasitic Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments such asFestering WoundsandDysentery.

Anti-Parasitic Tonic.name: Anti-Parasitic Tonic
Anti-Parasitic Tonic.description: Used alone to cure parasitic infections such asFestering WoundandDysenteryor as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylacticAnti-Parasitic Pill

Anti-Poison Pill.name: Anti-Poison Pill
Anti-Poison Pill.description: Anti-Poison Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments from contact with poisonous substances.

Anti-Poison Tonic.name: Anti-Poison Tonic
Anti-Poison Tonic.description: Used alone to cure Poison from critters like theVenomous Fish, or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylacticAnti-poison Pill.

Aquarium.name: Aquarium
Aquarium.description: The Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Aquarium will not spoil so long as there is biofuel available and the Aquarium is connected to a water network providing at least 250 units of water. The Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. With a fullBiofuel Can, the Aquarium will last about three and a half hours. Can only hold 1 fish.

Archer's Backpack.name: Archer's Backpack
Archer's Backpack.description: The Archer's Backpack is a must need for the avid archer, quickly dispatch a flurry of arrows at your target with this innovative quiver system.

Arctic Animal Feed.name: Arctic Animal Feed
Arctic Animal Feed.description: Arctic Animal Feed is anAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Arctic Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Arctic Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Arctic Scorpion Trophy.name: Arctic Scorpion Trophy
Arctic Scorpion Trophy.description: Arctic Scorpion Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Arctic Survival Saddle.name: Arctic Survival Saddle
Arctic Survival Saddle.description: The Arctic Survival Saddle is a saddle forMountsthat has +2 heavy cargo slots and attributes for arctic survival.

Arctic Vesper Trophy.name: Arctic Vesper Trophy
Arctic Vesper Trophy.description: An Arctic Vesper Trophy is a decorative deployable that can be placed on any wall surface and is used to liven any living space.

Arid Striker Trophy.name: Arid Striker Trophy
Arid Striker Trophy.description: Arid Striker Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Art Deco 2-Seater Couch.name: Art Deco 2-Seater Couch
Art Deco 2-Seater Couch.description: The Art Deco 2-Seater Couch is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco 3-Seater Couch.name: Art Deco 3-Seater Couch
Art Deco 3-Seater Couch.description: The Art Deco 3-Seater Couch is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Bookshelf.name: Art Deco Bookshelf
Art Deco Bookshelf.description: The Art Deco Bookshelf is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Chandelier.name: Art Deco Chandelier
Art Deco Chandelier.description: The Art Deco Chandelier is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Dresser.name: Art Deco Dresser
Art Deco Dresser.description: The Art Deco Dresser is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Fireplace.name: Art Deco Fireplace
Art Deco Fireplace.description: The Art Deco Fireplace is a gilded sleek stone fireplace that provides a source ofHeat,Light,Cozinessand a place to cook indoors without the hazards of an openCampfire.

Art Deco Fireplace Cap.name: Art Deco Fireplace Cap
Art Deco Fireplace Cap.description: The Art Deco Fireplace Cap is a final cap for placing on aArt Deco Fireplace ExtensionorArt Deco Fireplace. Two build variants are available via the 'R' key.

Art Deco Fireplace Extension.name: Art Deco Fireplace Extension
Art Deco Fireplace Extension.description: The Art Deco Fireplace Extension is a gilded section of chimney that is placed on anArt Deco Fireplaceand usually capped with anArt Deco Fireplace Cap. Two build variants are available via the 'R' key.

Art Deco Nightstand.name: Art Deco Nightstand
Art Deco Nightstand.description: The Art Deco Nightstand is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Partition.name: Art Deco Partition
Art Deco Partition.description: The Art Deco Partition is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Rug.name: Art Deco Rug
Art Deco Rug.description: The Art Deco Rug is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Safe.name: Art Deco Safe
Art Deco Safe.description: The Art Deco Safe is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Vase.name: Art Deco Vase
Art Deco Vase.description: The Art Deco Vase is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Vault.name: Art Deco Vault
Art Deco Vault.description: The Art Deco Vault is an gilded item of significant worth.

Art Deco Wardrobe.name: Art Deco Wardrobe
Art Deco Wardrobe.description: The Art Deco Wardrobe is an gilded item of significant worth.

Ashen Drake Trophy.name: Ashen Drake Trophy
Ashen Drake Trophy.description: Ashen Drake Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Attack Speed Attachment.name: Attack Speed Attachment
Attack Speed Attachment.description: Attack Speed Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Avocado.name: Avocado
Avocado.description: Avocado is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Avocado Farming Packet.name: Avocado Farming Packet
Avocado Farming Packet.description: The Avocado Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationor theOrbital Exchange Interfaceand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector fiveAvocadoseeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Bacon Butty.name: Bacon Butty
Bacon Butty.description: Bacon Butty is a consumable food that boosts health, stamina, health regeneration, experience gained and critical damage.

Banana.name: Banana
Banana.description: A Banana is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. It can be eaten to boost maximum stamina for 60 seconds and to satisfyHunger.

Banana Farming Packet.name: Banana Farming Packet
Banana Farming Packet.description: The Banana Farming Packet is a packet of seeds for planting and growingBananas. It is unlocked in theWorkshopafter completing the missionApe Escapein theGreat Hunts Campaigns.

Barbecue Carrot.name: Barbecue Carrot
Barbecue Carrot.description: Barbecue Carrot is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Bark Lure.name: Bark Lure
Bark Lure.description: The Bark Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Bark Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Basic Battery Rack.name: Basic Battery Rack
Basic Battery Rack.description: The Basic Battery Rack is a power-storing device that must be placed indoors. It can store up to 1,000kWs ofpowerand can charge/output power at a max rate of 1,500 Watts per second.

Basic Fertilizer.name: Basic Fertilizer
Basic Fertilizer.description: Basic Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the growth of plants. When applied, Crop Yield and Crop Growth Speed is increased by 15% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.

base_recipe.crafted_at:
Crafted at
 Wood Composter Chemistry Bench

Basic Rainwater Purifier.name: Basic Rainwater Purifier
Basic Rainwater Purifier.description: Basic Rainwater Purifiers can be crafted using Character Crafting with the following resources:

Basic Riding Saddle.name: Basic Riding Saddle
Basic Riding Saddle.description: The Basic Riding Saddle is an item that allows prospectors to ride tamedMounts. The Basic Riding Saddle can be use on allMounts(regardless of who tamed them) and comes with two inventory slots and one heavy cargo inventory slot forEquipment. Items stored in the saddle is dropped into a lootable overflow bag when the mount dies.

Basic Scope Attachment.name: Basic Scope Attachment
Basic Scope Attachment.description: Basic Scope Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech. Does not add actual scope to weapon.

Basic Water Purifier.name: Basic Water Purifier
Basic Water Purifier.description: Basic Water Purifiers can be crafted using Character Crafting with the following resources:

Battery Cavelight.name: Battery Cavelight
Battery Cavelight.description: The Battery Cavelight is a portableLight Sourcethat can be deployed on a floor or wall to provide illumination in the surrounding area. It is good for marking a path through caves.

Battery Spotlight.name: Battery Spotlight
Battery Spotlight.description: The Battery Spotlight is a portableLight Sourcethat can be deployed on a floor or wall to provide illumination in a concentrated area. It is useful as a temporary light source while mining in caves.

Bean Farming Packet.name: Bean Farming Packet
Bean Farming Packet.description: The Bean Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Bean seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Bear Rug.name: Bear Rug
Bear Rug.description: Bear Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Bear Trophy.name: Bear Trophy
Bear Trophy.description: Bear Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

BEAST.name: BEAST
BEAST.description: While holding the BEAST, Prospectors can left-click while looking at an animal to "scan" that animal (must be close to the target to initiate a scan). Unlike what the description says, the scanned animal will take additional damage until another scan is performed. Scanning animals using the BEAST also grants 3 bestiary points for the animal scanned.

Beehive.name: Beehive
Beehive.description: The Beehive is the foundation forBeekeepingall other units attach to the hive. The base model usesWorker BeesorQueen Beesas fuel to produceHoneycomb. Honeycomb is produced at 1 unit per min.

Beehive Breeding Center.name: Beehive Breeding Center
Beehive Breeding Center.description: ABeekeepingelement that attaches to aBeehiveand provides the facilities for aQueen Beeto produceWorker Bees

Beehive Extractor.name: Beehive Extractor
Beehive Extractor.description: ABeekeepingelement that attaches to a smallBeehiveto automatically extractHoneyandBeeswaxfromHoneycomb. Requires power and is attached through the small Beehive GUI.

Beer.name: Beer
Beer.description: Beer is a mid-game beverage made fromYeastandWheatthat greatly increases stamina and stamina regeneration.

Big Breakfast.name: Big Breakfast
Big Breakfast.description: Big Breakfast is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Binoculars.name: Binoculars
Binoculars.description: See your prey from further away.

Biofuel.name: Biofuel
Biofuel.description: Biofuel is a mid-game,Tier 3fuel that can be crafted or purchased and used to fuel a variety ofDeployableequipment and sometimes quest items seen inMissions.

Biofuel Bio-Cleaner.name: Biofuel Bio-Cleaner
Biofuel Bio-Cleaner.description: The Biofuel Bio-Cleaner is a deployableTier 3cleaning device that can process organic materials collected from world bosses intoLegendary Biomassand clean infected materials found onPrometheus, similar to theTier 4Organic Residue Cleanser.

Biofuel Can.name: Biofuel Can
Biofuel Can.description: Biofuel Can is used to storeBiofuel. It is filled at either theBiofuel ComposterorElectric Composter.

Biofuel Chimney Cap.name: Biofuel Chimney Cap
Biofuel Chimney Cap.description: A Biofuel Chimney Cap is the final cap piece to place on aBiofuel Chimney Extensionor directly on aBiofuel Fireplace. Two variants, a half height and full height, are available by holding the 'R' key when deploying.

Biofuel Chimney Extension.name: Biofuel Chimney Extension
Biofuel Chimney Extension.description: A Biofuel Chimney Extension is a wide round section of metal chimney or stove pipe to place on aBiofuel Fireplaceor another existing Biofuel Chimney Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with aBiofuel Chimney Cap.

Biofuel Composter.name: Biofuel Composter
Biofuel Composter.description: The Biofuel Composter enables the Prospector to produceBiofuel. Can be connected to a water network providing at least 100 units ofwaterto increase processing speed, but is not required to produce Biofuel.

Biofuel Fireplace.name: Biofuel Fireplace
Biofuel Fireplace.description: The Biofuel Fireplace is deployableTier 3version of theFireplacethat burnsBiofuelto provide a source of heat, a source oflight,Cozinessand a means to cookFoodindoors.

Biofuel Generator.name: Biofuel Generator
Biofuel Generator.description: The Biofuel Generator generatesElectricitywhen supplied with biofuel from aBiofuel Can. Use anElectricity Toolto connect it toBenchesto provide power.

Biofuel Lamp.name: Biofuel Lamp
Biofuel Lamp.description: Provides exceptional lightning compared to theTorchorLantern. Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar.

Biofuel Oxite Dissolver.name: Biofuel Oxite Dissolver
Biofuel Oxite Dissolver.description: More efficient than theOxite Dissolver, this is used in tandem withOxygen Containersplaced into the oxidizer. The front slots of the deployable only acceptOxygen Containersand will automatically fill said containers fromOxiteplaced into the machine when supplied with Biofuel from aBiofuel Can. A fullBiofuel Canwill last three minutes and twenty seconds, producing 0.2 Liters of Oxygen every two seconds.

Biofuel Stove.name: Biofuel Stove
Biofuel Stove.description: The Biofuel Stove is a mid- to late-game technology that expands the recipes available compared to thePotbelly Stove. It requiresBiofuelto run and must be snapped to a side of theKitchen Bench.

Biofuel Water Pump.name: Biofuel Water Pump
Biofuel Water Pump.description: The Biofuel Water Pump outputs 1,000Waterwhen supplied with biofuel; use theWater Pipe Toolto connect it toCrafting Benches/Water Storageto provide water. The Biofuel Water Pump can output water for two hours and thirty minutes with a fullBiofuel Can.

Biotech Maul.name: Biotech Maul
Biotech Maul.description: The Biotech Maul is a heavy melee-focusedLegendary Weaponthat can be purchased at theBio-lab.

Black Jaguar Trophy.name: Black Jaguar Trophy
Black Jaguar Trophy.description: Black Jaguar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Black Wolf Lure.name: Black Wolf Lure
Black Wolf Lure.description: The Black Wolf Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Black Wolf Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Black Wolf Tooth.name: Black Wolf Tooth
Black Wolf Tooth.description: Black Wolf Teeth are a resource obtained by skinning anAlpha Wolf. Only after completingLupine: Exterminationcan these be used to craft new weaponry at theAnvil Bench.

Blood Thinning Pill.name: Blood Thinning Pill
Blood Thinning Pill.description: Blood Thinning Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, furtherContusionsandConcussions.

Blood Thinning Tonic.name: Blood Thinning Tonic
Blood Thinning Tonic.description: Used alone to treat trauma such asConcussionandContusion, when you're unlucky enough to kiss a falling tree, or as a mid-stage ingredient to craft theBlood Thinning Pill.

Blueback Trophy.name: Blueback Trophy
Blueback Trophy.description: Blueback Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Blue Reed Lure.name: Blue Reed Lure
Blue Reed Lure.description: The Blue Reed Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Blue Reed Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Bovine Pack Harness.name: Bovine Pack Harness
Bovine Pack Harness.description: The Bovine Pack Harness is a cargo saddle forBuffaloandTuskerthat has 22 inventory slots and +300 Kg weight capacity.

Bramble Farming Packet.name: Bramble Farming Packet
Bramble Farming Packet.description: The Bramble Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Bramble seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Broiled Kumara.name: Broiled Kumara
Broiled Kumara.description: Broiled Kumara is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Broken Pottery.name: Broken Pottery
Broken Pottery.description: The Broken Pottery is an item unlocked by completing theFracturemission. There are four varieties of pottery selectable by 'R'.

Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue.name: Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue
Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue.description: The Bronze Alpha Sandworm Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Bear Statue.name: Bronze Bear Statue
Bronze Bear Statue.description: The Bronze Bear Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Cougar Statue.name: Bronze Cougar Statue
Bronze Cougar Statue.description: The Bronze Cougar Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Elephant Statue.name: Bronze Elephant Statue
Bronze Elephant Statue.description: The Bronze Elephant Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Hyena Statue.name: Bronze Hyena Statue
Bronze Hyena Statue.description: The Bronze Hyena Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Jaguar Statue.name: Bronze Jaguar Statue
Bronze Jaguar Statue.description: The Bronze Jaguar Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Polar Bear Statue.name: Bronze Polar Bear Statue
Bronze Polar Bear Statue.description: The Bronze Polar Bear Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Scorpion Statue.name: Bronze Scorpion Statue
Bronze Scorpion Statue.description: The Bronze Scorpion Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Bronze Snow Leopard Statue.name: Bronze Snow Leopard Statue
Bronze Snow Leopard Statue.description: The Bronze Snow Leopard Statue is a decorative bronze item.

Brutalist 2-Seater Couch.name: Brutalist 2-Seater Couch
Brutalist 2-Seater Couch.description: The Brutalist 2-Seater Couch is a couch made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist 3-Seater Couch.name: Brutalist 3-Seater Couch
Brutalist 3-Seater Couch.description:
The Brutalist 3-Seater Couch is a couch made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus toCoziness.
The Brutalist 3-Seater Couch is part of the Industrial Furniture Pack DLC.

Brutalist Bookshelf.name: Brutalist Bookshelf
Brutalist Bookshelf.description: The Brutalist Bookshelf is mode from concrete and iron.

Brutalist Display Cabinet.name: Brutalist Display Cabinet
Brutalist Display Cabinet.description: The Brutalist Display Cabinet is made from concrete and iron, and serves as decorative shelving and a display cabinet. It has 25 inventory slots forStorageand provides a small bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist Dresser.name: Brutalist Dresser
Brutalist Dresser.description: The Brutalist Dresser is a concrete bedroom furniture piece made in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It has 10 inventory slots forStorageand provides a small bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist Lamp.name: Brutalist Lamp
Brutalist Lamp.description: The Brutalist Lamp is a table lamp with a concrete base and round shade in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It requires 150 units ofElectricityto operate and provides aLight Sourceand bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist Nightstand.name: Brutalist Nightstand
Brutalist Nightstand.description: The Brutalist Nightstand is a concrete bedside furniture piece made in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It has 10 inventory slots forStorageand provides a small bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist Square Lamp.name: Brutalist Square Lamp
Brutalist Square Lamp.description: The Brutalist Square Lamp is a table lamp with a concrete base and a square shade (despite the appearance of the in-game item icon) in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It requires 150 units ofElectricityto operate and provides aLight Sourceand bonus toCoziness.

Brutalist Stool.name: Brutalist Stool
Brutalist Stool.description: The Brutalist Stool seats one and is made from concrete.

Brutalist Wardrobe.name: Brutalist Wardrobe
Brutalist Wardrobe.description: The Brutalist Wardrobe is a concrete bedside furniture piece made in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It has 25 inventory slots forStorageand provides a small bonus toCoziness. The deployable has two varieties selectable by the 'R' key.

Buffalo Rug.name: Buffalo Rug
Buffalo Rug.description: Buffalo Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Buffalo Trophy.name: Buffalo Trophy
Buffalo Trophy.description: Buffalo Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Building Upgrade Tool.name: Building Upgrade Tool
Building Upgrade Tool.description: This item is no longer craftable.  Upgrade functionality has been merged with all repair hammers: prospectors can hold R to select a building material and Right-ClickBuilding Piecesto apply the upgrade if they have the new building pieces in their inventory.

Bullseye Target.name: Bullseye Target
Bullseye Target.description: Bullseye Targets are deployable items used for target practice and to test weapon damage.

Butter.name: Butter
Butter.description: Butter is a late-game intermediate resource crafted fromCreamand used in various recipes.

C0NT4CT Radio.name: C0NT4CT Radio
C0NT4CT Radio.description: The C0NT4CT Radio is a portable device that when in range, provides the same access to missions as aCONT4CT DeviceinOpen Worldprospects.

Cacoa Farming Packet.name: Cacoa Farming Packet
Cacoa Farming Packet.description: The Cacoa Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Cocoa seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Calibrated Grip Attachment.name: Calibrated Grip Attachment
Calibrated Grip Attachment.description: Calibrated Grip Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech. It is worth noting that The Wear Rate reduction applies to weapons as well as tools.

Campfire.name: Campfire
Campfire.description: The first available cooking station, the campfire is an essential early structure that allows prospectors to pass the night and to cookRaw MeatorFish Chunks, yielding safe to consume versions.

Canteen.name: Canteen
Canteen.description: Filled at any water source, including aRain Reservoir. The Canteen is water tight, and is a mid-game item requiring aMachining Bench. Canteens can hold 5.0 L of water, 5 times as much as a water skin and can keep the Prospector hydrated for approximately 10x as long due to the leakage of the water skin.

Caramel Pastry.name: Caramel Pastry
Caramel Pastry.description: Caramel Pastry is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Carbon Javelin.name: Carbon Javelin
Carbon Javelin.description: The Carbon Javelin is a variant of theCarbon Spearthat can only be thrown and is a cheaper upgrade to thePlatinum Javelinthat deals more damage and has a lower break chance.

Carrot Cake.name: Carrot Cake
Carrot Cake.description: Carrot Cake is a deployableFooditem that when placed on a surface will provide 8Carrot Cake Piecesthat can be picked up and consumed by Prospectors.

Carrot Cake Piece.name: Carrot Cake Piece
Carrot Cake Piece.description: Carrot Cake Piece is a late-gameFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Carrot Farming Packet.name: Carrot Farming Packet
Carrot Farming Packet.description: The Carrot Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Carrot seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Caveworm Javelin.name: Caveworm Javelin
Caveworm Javelin.description: The Caveworm Javelin is a variant of theCaveworm Spearthat can only be thrown. Although Javelins have a moderate charge time and projectile travel time, they are one of the highest damage-dealing weapons in Icarus and are devastating when mastered. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to twenty.

Caveworm Trophy.name: Caveworm Trophy
Caveworm Trophy.description: Caveworm Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Cave Survival Inhaler.name: Cave Survival Inhaler
Cave Survival Inhaler.description: The Cave Survival Inhaler is aMedicinethat boosts resistance toCave Sickness, increases health and stamina regeneration in caves and adds a 15% chance to harvest additionalStonewhen mining.

Cement Mixer.name: Cement Mixer
Cement Mixer.description: The Cement Mixer allows the Prospector to craftConcrete Mix, andConcrete Building Pieces.

Chala Trophy.name: Chala Trophy
Chala Trophy.description: Chala Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Chamois Trophy.name: Chamois Trophy
Chamois Trophy.description: Chamois Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Charcoal.name: Charcoal
Charcoal.description: Charcoal is a basic resource used for a variety of items, ranging fromGunpowderto end-game medicines likeAntibiotic Pill. It is obtained either as a byproduct of burning wood in aCrafting/Cooking BenchorFurnacethat requires wood as a fuel, also it can be obtained from felling a fully burnt tree.

Chargrilled Chicken.name: Chargrilled Chicken
Chargrilled Chicken.description: Chargrilled Chicken is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Charred Corn.name: Charred Corn
Charred Corn.description: Charred Corn is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Cheese.name: Cheese
Cheese.description: Cheese is a consumable food that boosts stamina and health regeneration.

Cheese Pizza Slice.name: Cheese Pizza Slice
Cheese Pizza Slice.description: Cheese Pizza Slice is a late-gameFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. It provides a boost to health, stamina, stamina regeneration and experience gained and granted to allies.

Cheese Roll.name: Cheese Roll
Cheese Roll.description: Cheese Roll is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Chewy Coconut Cookie.name: Chewy Coconut Cookie
Chewy Coconut Cookie.description: Chewy Coconut Cookie is a late-gameFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Chimney Cap.name: Chimney Cap
Chimney Cap.description: A Chimney Cap is the final cap piece to place on aChimney Extensionor directly on aFireplace. A smaller variant, theChimney Cap Halfcan also be used for the same purpose.

Chimney Cap Half.name: Chimney Cap Half
Chimney Cap Half.description: A Chimney Cap Half is a decorative final cap piece to place on aChimney Extensionor directly on aFireplace. It is the smaller variant of theChimney Cap, but with less vertical height.

Chimney Extension.name: Chimney Extension
Chimney Extension.description: A Chimney Extension is a decorative section of stone chimney to place on aFireplaceor another existing Chimney Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with aChimney CaporChimney Cap Half.

Chocolate Cake.name: Chocolate Cake
Chocolate Cake.description: Chocolate Cake is a deployableFooditem that when placed on a surface will provide 8Chocolate Cake Piecesthat can be picked up and consumed by Prospectors.

Chocolate Cake Piece.name: Chocolate Cake Piece
Chocolate Cake Piece.description: Chocolate Cake Piece is a late-gameFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Choc-Chip Cookie.name: Choc-Chip Cookie
Choc-Chip Cookie.description: Choc-Chip Cookie is late-gameFoodthat when consumed provides a considerable boost to stamina, charge speed, reload speed and a chance to mine additional stone.

Classic Rustic Sign.name: Classic Rustic Sign
Classic Rustic Sign.description: A Classic Rustic Sign made of wood.

Clay.name: Clay
Clay.description: A moldable, fine-grained material that can be baked into bricks. Clay is found in theSwampBiomein Icarus. In order to collect it, one needs to first break it apart using aSledgehammer. Clay can be refined intoClay Bricksat any furnace.

Clay Brick.name: Clay Brick
Clay Brick.description: Clay Bricks are a refined resource primarily used to craftClay Brick Building Piecesat anAdvanced Masonry Bench/Electric Masonry Bench.

Coconut Cake.name: Coconut Cake
Coconut Cake.description: Coconut Cake is a deployableFooditem that when placed on a surface will provide 8Coconut Cake Piecesthat can be picked up and consumed by Prospectors.

Coconut Cake Piece.name: Coconut Cake Piece
Coconut Cake Piece.description: Coconut Cake Piece is a late-gameFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Coffee Farming Packet.name: Coffee Farming Packet
Coffee Farming Packet.description: The Coffee Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Coffee seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Cold Survival Inhaler.name: Cold Survival Inhaler
Cold Survival Inhaler.description: The Cold Survival Inhaler is aMedicinethat boosts resistance to cold, damage from frost and the HypothermiaStatus Effect.

Composites.name: Composites
Composites.description: Composites are an end-game crafted material used to makeTier 4 Armorsand variousWeapons/Deployables. Prospectors require aMaterial Processor, anElectric Furnace, andPower.

Composite Javelin.name: Composite Javelin
Composite Javelin.description: The Composite Javelin is a variant of theComposite Spearthat can only be thrown and is the highest damage dealing Javelin currently available. Despite the heavy tech investment to reachComposites, Composite Javelins are far cheaper to craft than theTitanium Javelinand are worth the investment for the increased damage and low projectile break chance.

Composite Tactical Shield.name: Composite Tactical Shield
Composite Tactical Shield.description: The Composite Tactical Shield is crafted at the Foundry with the following resources:

Concrete Mix.name: Concrete Mix
Concrete Mix.description: Concrete Mix is used widely in crafting of items such asConcrete Building Pieces,Concrete Furnace, and theFabricator.

Condensed Enzymes.name: Condensed Enzymes
Condensed Enzymes.description: Condensed Enzymes are a unique resource in Icarus, introduced as part of the horde events. These geysers are scattered across various biomes. To trigger the event, players need to deploy aVapor Condenser(crafted at theFabricator) on top of anEnzyme Geysers. Successfully completing the event typically rewards players withExotics; however, once the reward cap of three Exotics is reached, further completions will yield Condensed Enzymes instead.

CONT4CT Device.name: CONT4CT Device
CONT4CT Device.description: The CONT4CT Device grants Prospectors access to SMPL3 missions andOperations. Though the CONT4CT Device can be crafted inMissions, they can only be used inOpen WorldsandOutposts. Must be deployed outdoors.

Corn Farming Packet.name: Corn Farming Packet
Corn Farming Packet.description: The Corn Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Corn seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Cougar Rug.name: Cougar Rug
Cougar Rug.description: Cougar Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Cougar Trophy.name: Cougar Trophy
Cougar Trophy.description: Cougar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Crafting.name: Crafting
Crafting.description: Crafting is the skill that enables many of the other ways prospectors pursue their goals on Icarus. While they can gatherFoodwith their bare hands, and can attempt toHuntwith their fists, everything they attempt on the moon's surface is facilitated by crafting.

Cream.name: Cream
Cream.description: Cream is a late-game intermediate resource crafted fromMilkand used in various recipes.

Creamed Corn.name: Creamed Corn
Creamed Corn.description: Creamed Corn is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Creamed Corn, which increases maximumHealthandStaminaand reduces the Stamina consumed by actions.

Crispy Bacon.name: Crispy Bacon
Crispy Bacon.description: Crispy Bacon is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Crispy Potato.name: Crispy Potato
Crispy Potato.description: Crispy Potato is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Crocodile Skin Saddle.name: Crocodile Skin Saddle
Crocodile Skin Saddle.description: The Crocodile Skin Saddle is a saddle formountsthat has an crocodile theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

Crocodile Trophy.name: Crocodile Trophy
Crocodile Trophy.description: Crocodile Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Crunchy Soy Bean.name: Crunchy Soy Bean
Crunchy Soy Bean.description: Crunchy Soy Bean is a consumable food that boosts maximum health and health regeneration.

Crystallized Miasma.name: Crystallized Miasma
Crystallized Miasma.description: Crystallized Miasma is a resource required to makeDistilled Miasmic Coating, a precursor resource used in making Miasmic Tools, Weapons, and Ammunition. Crystallized Miasma is collected from Fauna located inSwampsacross Icarus - a map of Prometheus regions can be foundhere).

Culinex Backpack.name: Culinex Backpack
Culinex Backpack.description: The Culinex Backpack provides six inventory slots, reduces consumption of food and water, adds +25% to the effectiveness of cooked food modifiers and increases the duration of cooked food modifiers by +25% for items cooked with the backpack equipped.

Deep Freeze.name: Deep Freeze
Deep Freeze.description: The Deep Freeze is a high-tier item and completely stops the spoil timer for items stored inside. It requires 2,500 units ofPowerto keep temperatures below freezing, so a strong power source and consistent stream of electricity are critical.

Deer Rug.name: Deer Rug
Deer Rug.description: Deer Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Deer Trophy.name: Deer Trophy
Deer Trophy.description: Deer Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Defensive Combat Inhaler.name: Defensive Combat Inhaler
Defensive Combat Inhaler.description: The Defensive Combat Inhaler is a melee combat-focusedMedicinethat boosts maximum health and returns 40% of physical damage back to the attacker.

Dehumidifier.name: Dehumidifier
Dehumidifier.description: The Dehumidifier allows for cave exploration without the risk of catchingCave Sicknesswithin its effective range. Unlike theElectric Dehumidifier, the Dehumidifier does not preventCavewormsfrom spawning.

Desert Animal Feed.name: Desert Animal Feed
Desert Animal Feed.description: Desert Animal Feed is anAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Desert Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Desert Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Desert Tracker Saddle.name: Desert Tracker Saddle
Desert Tracker Saddle.description: The Desert Tracker Saddle is a saddle formountsthat has desert theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

Detoxifier Module.name: Detoxifier Module
Detoxifier Module.description: This module increases poison resistance by 50% when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot, reducing the amount of damage received when poisoned. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Detoxifier Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The resistance increase from each Detoxifier Module will stack and will grant near immunity to poison if four are equipped.

Directional Worklamp.name: Directional Worklamp
Directional Worklamp.description: The Directional Worklamp provides lighting for a Prospector's base. Requires 150 units ofpowerto function.

Dirt.name: Dirt
Dirt.description: Dirt is aResourcefound on the surface of Icarus inForest,Grassland, andSwampbiomes. Dirt is collected with aShoveland can be used to make a variety of items.

Dirt Mounds.name: Dirt Mounds
Dirt Mounds.description: AShovelcan be used on grass/dirt/mud to create a dirt mound by right-clicking. Dirt mounds can also be made in bulk by using aSeeding Cart.

Distilled Miasmic Coating.name: Distilled Miasmic Coating
Distilled Miasmic Coating.description: Distilled Miasmic Coating is a refined resource primarily used to craft a variety of Miasmic Tools, Weapons, and Ammunition that can give Prospectors an edge while on the surface of Icarus.

Dogtags Lure.name: Dogtags Lure
Dogtags Lure.description: The Dogtags Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Dogtags Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

DoseUp Module.name: DoseUp Module
DoseUp Module.description: This module reduces oxygen, food, and water consumption by 15% when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple DoseUp Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further reduce the consumption of oxygen, food, and water.

Drac Trophy.name: Drac Trophy
Drac Trophy.description: Drac Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Dreadwing Trophy.name: Dreadwing Trophy
Dreadwing Trophy.description: Dreadwing Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Dried Avocado.name: Dried Avocado
Dried Avocado.description: Dried Avocado is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Freshwater Fillet.name: Dried Freshwater Fillet
Dried Freshwater Fillet.description: Dried Freshwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Giant Steak.name: Dried Giant Steak
Dried Giant Steak.description: Dried Giant Steak is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Kiwifruit Chips.name: Dried Kiwifruit Chips
Dried Kiwifruit Chips.description: Dried Kiwifruit Chips is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Rhubarb.name: Dried Rhubarb
Dried Rhubarb.description: Dried Rhubarb is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Saltwater Fillet.name: Dried Saltwater Fillet
Dried Saltwater Fillet.description: Dried Saltwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Dried Tomato.name: Dried Tomato
Dried Tomato.description: Dried Tomato is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Drying Rack.name: Drying Rack
Drying Rack.description: The Drying Rack is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way for Prospectors to preserve foods, while also giving the Prospector a variety of unique status effects from various dried foods. The Drying Rack can also be used to createCured Leather.

Economic Attachment.name: Economic Attachment
Economic Attachment.description: Economic Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Electricity Tool.name: Electricity Tool
Electricity Tool.description: The Electricity Tool connectsPower SourcestoDeployables/Power Storageto provideElectricity.

Electric Chimney Cap.name: Electric Chimney Cap
Electric Chimney Cap.description: A Electric Chimney Cap is the final cap piece to place on anElectric Chimney Extensionor directly on anElectric Fireplace.

Electric Chimney Extension.name: Electric Chimney Extension
Electric Chimney Extension.description: A Electric Chimney Extension is a wide flat section of metal chimney or stove pipe to place on aElectric Fireplaceor another existing Electric Chimney Extension to extend the chimney vertically. It is usually capped with aElectric Chimney Cap.

Electric Composter.name: Electric Composter
Electric Composter.description: The Electric Composter enables the Prospector to produceBiofuelat an accelerated rate compared to theBiofuel Composter. An active power connection providing at least 1500 units is required to operate the Electric Composter. Similar to theBiofuel Composter, an activeWatersource increases processing speed and is not required.

Electric Dehumidifier.name: Electric Dehumidifier
Electric Dehumidifier.description: The Electric Dehumidifier allows for cave exploration without the risk of catchingCave Sicknesswhile also preventingcave wormsfrom spawning within its effective range. Will not prevent creatures from spawning when activatingThumpers, Radars, or other mission items that have been placed or activated.

Electric Extractor.name: Electric Extractor
Electric Extractor.description: The Electric Extractor is used to extractExoticsfrom Exotic Deposits. A connection providing at least 1,500 units ofpoweris required.

Electric Fireplace.name: Electric Fireplace
Electric Fireplace.description: The Electric Fireplace isTier 4version of theFireplacethat is powered byElectricityto provide a source of heat, a source oflight,Cozinessand a means to cookFoodindoors. At least 250 units of electricity are required to power the fireplace.

Electric Stove.name: Electric Stove
Electric Stove.description: The Electric Stove is a late-game technology that provides a more robust cooking experience and expands the recipes available compared to theBiofuel Stove. It requires 1,000 units ofPowerto function and must be snapped to a side of aMarble Kitchen BenchorKitchen Bench.

Electric Water Pump.name: Electric Water Pump
Electric Water Pump.description: The Electric Water Pump providesWaterwhen supplied with electricity, use theWater Pipe Toolto connect it toCrafting Benches/Water Storageto provide water. Requires 1,000 units ofElectricityto function and outputs 1,000 units ofWater.

Electric Water Purifier.name: Electric Water Purifier
Electric Water Purifier.description: Electric Water Purifiers can be crafted from the Fabricator with the following resources once the appropriate blueprint point has been spent:

Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer.name: Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer
Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer.description: The Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer produces oxygen from water, removing the need forOxite. Requires 1,550Wattsand 500Litersper second to function. The Electrolytic Oxygen Synthesizer can hold up to 10Oxygen Containersand will auto fill tanks in seconds.

Electronics.name: Electronics
Electronics.description: Electronics are used in a variety of high-end buildings and components.

Elephant Trophy.name: Elephant Trophy
Elephant Trophy.description: Elephant Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Encrypted Satellite Upgrade.name: Encrypted Satellite Upgrade
Encrypted Satellite Upgrade.description: The Encrypted Satellite Upgrade grants Prospectors access toOperationslocked behind encrypted signals.Note:anInfrasonic Relay Upgrademust also be slotted into aCONT4CT Deviceto access encrypted signals.

Endurance Animal Feed.name: Endurance Animal Feed
Endurance Animal Feed.description: Endurance Animal Feed is anAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Endurance Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Endurance Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Endurogel.name: Endurogel
Endurogel.description: Endurogel is aConsumablethat restores a portion of stamina when consumed. It is a one time use consumable.

Energy Bar.name: Energy Bar
Energy Bar.description: Energy Bar is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. It provides buffs good for being on the go.

Enzyme Geysers.name: Enzyme Geysers
Enzyme Geysers.description: Enzyme Geysers are natural formations found across several biomes in Icarus. These geysers are important resource nodes that offer valuable materials depending on the equipment used.

Epoxy.name: Epoxy
Epoxy.description: Epoxy is used extensively in crafting a variety of items deep into the end-game. Prospectors will find themselves stocking up on epoxy very often.

Equix Trophy.name: Equix Trophy
Equix Trophy.description: Equix Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Farmers Satchel.name: Farmers Satchel
Farmers Satchel.description: Farmers Satchel is a leather satchel that is aTier 2upgrade for theSeed Pouch, has 24 inventory slots and holds bothFertilizerandSeeds.

Filtered Water Trough.name: Filtered Water Trough
Filtered Water Trough.description: The Filtered Water Trough is an expensive variant of theLarge Water Troughthat is used to keepMountsandPetshydrated. Currently does not apply a modifier to animals that drink from it, making it an expensive upgrade to it's lower tier counterparts. Must be connected toElectricityandWaterproviding at least 1,000 Watts and 30 liters per second to function.

Firepit.name: Firepit
Firepit.description: The Firepit is an upgrade to theCampfire, providing significantly more heat, increased inventory size, and is marginally faster at processing. Due to the increased weight of the Firepit, it should only be deployed in structures that provide adequate support.

Fireplace.name: Fireplace
Fireplace.description: The Fireplace is deployable stone and wood building piece that provides a source of heat, a source of light,Cozinessand a safer alternative to cookingFoodthan theCampfire. It provides an indoor source of heat that allows the prospector to avoid inadvertently setting themselves ablaze.

Fire Extinguisher.name: Fire Extinguisher
Fire Extinguisher.description: The Fire Extinguisher is aTier 3tool used to hastily put out fires. As Prospectors use the Fire Extinguisher, its durability decreases and cannot be repaired at theMachining Benchwhen broken.

Fire Whacker.name: Fire Whacker
Fire Whacker.description: The Fire Whacker is used to put out brush fires on the ground, other players who are on fire, or structures that are ablaze from lightning strikes. The Fire Whacker can also be used to put yourself out - aim down at your feet and start whacking; cannot be in/on source of fire while attempting to use the fire whacker on yourself.

F.I.S.H..name: F.I.S.H.
F.I.S.H..description: When held, the F.I.S.H. will scan the area and indicate which fish can be caught in the area with the base percent chance of catching each. As the Prospector catches each type, the icons for each will appear on the display.

Flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower.description: The Flamethrower is a biofuel-powered weapon that sprays a jet of flame that sets fire to any creatures or flammable materials such as trees, shrubs orWood Building Pieces.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: The Flashlight is a late-gameLight Source, capable of illuminating an entire cave. Can be equipped in the "L" light slot on the hotbar.

Flexible Frame Attachment.name: Flexible Frame Attachment
Flexible Frame Attachment.description: Flexible Frame Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Flour.name: Flour
Flour.description: Flour is prepared from groundWheatand is the primary precursor forFlatbread Dough,Bread DoughandPastry.

Flow Meter.name: Flow Meter
Flow Meter.description: Power/water networks can be connected to a Flow Meter, where it will display how much power/water is being produced, consumed, and stored. Only one network can be shown at a time -  press 'F' to toggle between power and water networks. Deployables can be toggled on/off remotely via the Flow Meter.

Foundry.name: Foundry
Foundry.description: The Foundry is theTier 4variant of theAnvil Benchthat will allow the Prospector to craft the highest quality tools/weapons available on planet, such as theTitanium Pickaxe,Compound Bow, etc. The Foundry is also capable of craftingTier 2/Tier 3tools and weapons, removing the need for aAnvil BenchandForge.

Freshwater Fillet Curry.name: Freshwater Fillet Curry
Freshwater Fillet Curry.description: Freshwater Fillet Curry is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fried Chicken.name: Fried Chicken
Fried Chicken.description: Fried Chicken is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Fried Eggs.name: Fried Eggs
Fried Eggs.description: Fried Eggs is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fried Tomato.name: Fried Tomato
Fried Tomato.description: Fried Tomato is a consumable food that boosts stamina and health regeneration. AsTomatoesare only found onPrometheus, this recipe requires the New Frontiers DLC to obtain the ingredients.

Frontier Revolver.name: Frontier Revolver
Frontier Revolver.description: The Frontier Revolver is aLegendary Weaponthat can be purchased at theBio-lab.

Fruit Muffin.name: Fruit Muffin
Fruit Muffin.description: Fruit Muffin is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fruit Pie.name: Fruit Pie
Fruit Pie.description: Fruit Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fruit Salad.name: Fruit Salad
Fruit Salad.description: Fruit Salad is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Fruit Smoothie.name: Fruit Smoothie
Fruit Smoothie.description: Fruit Smoothie is a refreshingDrinkthat when consumed provides a boost to experience gained and resistance to cave sickness.

Fruit Snack Pack.name: Fruit Snack Pack
Fruit Snack Pack.description: Fruit Snack Pack is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Full Sandworm Brazier.name: Full Sandworm Brazier
Full Sandworm Brazier.description: The Full Sandworm Brazier is a large deployable and decorative source ofHeatandLightmade from the remains of aSandworm.

Full Sandworm Trophy.name: Full Sandworm Trophy
Full Sandworm Trophy.description: The Full Sandworm Trophy is a large decorative deployable that can be placed on the ground to display the remains of a once mightySandworm.

Gatherer's Backpack.name: Gatherer's Backpack
Gatherer's Backpack.description: The Gatherer's Backpack is a must need when mining ores, or felling trees!

Glaci Trophy.name: Glaci Trophy
Glaci Trophy.description: Glaci Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Glass.name: Glass
Glass.description: Glass is a crafted resource refined fromSilica OreorSand.

Glass Bottle.name: Glass Bottle
Glass Bottle.description: The Glass Bottle is a resource used to makeBeer,Wine, andHoney Mead.

Glass Jar.name: Glass Jar
Glass Jar.description: The Glass Jar is a resource used to makeFoodslikeStrawberry Jam,Pickled Carrot, etc.

Glass Milk Bottle.name: Glass Milk Bottle
Glass Milk Bottle.description: Glass Milk Bottle is a container for liquidMilk. It holds 2 litres of Milk and prevents it from spoiling.

Go.name: Go
Go.description: Go is aConsumablewith a uniqueStatus Effect: 'All Go'. Can be consumed to satisfyThirst. It is a one time use emergency beverage to quench thirst.

Gold Attachment.name: Gold Attachment
Gold Attachment.description: Gold Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Gold Cluster Lamp.name: Gold Cluster Lamp
Gold Cluster Lamp.description: The Gold Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Gold Geode Lamp.name: Gold Geode Lamp
Gold Geode Lamp.description: The Gold Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Gold Monolith Lamp.name: Gold Monolith Lamp
Gold Monolith Lamp.description: The Gold Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Gold Wire.name: Gold Wire
Gold Wire.description: Gold Wire is used in a variety of high-end buildings and components and is crafted in batches of 5.

Gorse Farming Packet.name: Gorse Farming Packet
Gorse Farming Packet.description: The Gorse Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Gorse seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Gorse Flower Lure.name: Gorse Flower Lure
Gorse Flower Lure.description: The Gorse Flower Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Gorse Flower Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Gorse Tea.name: Gorse Tea
Gorse Tea.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filledLiquid Containersuch as aThermosandGorse Flower.

Grilled Freshwater Fillet.name: Grilled Freshwater Fillet
Grilled Freshwater Fillet.description: Grilled Freshwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Grilled Pumpkin.name: Grilled Pumpkin
Grilled Pumpkin.description: Grilled Pumpkin is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Grilled Saltwater Fillet.name: Grilled Saltwater Fillet
Grilled Saltwater Fillet.description: Grilled Saltwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Growth Fertilizer.name: Growth Fertilizer
Growth Fertilizer.description: Growth Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the growth speed of grown crops. When applied, Crop Growth Speed is increased by 50% and Crop Yield is decreased by 25% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.

Guano.name: Guano
Guano.description: Guano is a resource found within the nests ofArctic Vespers, these bat-like creatures inhabit the arctic regions of the game. Players can harvest Guano from their nests once destroyed, providing a valuable material for crafting.

Handcannon Attachment.name: Handcannon Attachment
Handcannon Attachment.description: Handcannon Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Healing Boost Module.name: Healing Boost Module
Healing Boost Module.description: When equipped in a module slot of anEnvirosuit, this module decreases the duration of negative afflictions received by other Prospectors near the user, however it does not affect the wearer. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop.

Health Recovery Elixir.name: Health Recovery Elixir
Health Recovery Elixir.description: Health Recovery Elixir is a craftableMedicinethat immediately boosts your health by 500 points when consumed.

Hearty Salad.name: Hearty Salad
Hearty Salad.description: Hearty Salad is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Heat Survival Inhaler.name: Heat Survival Inhaler
Heat Survival Inhaler.description: The Heat Survival Inhaler is aMedicinethat boosts resistance to heat, damage from fire and the HyperthermiaStatus Effect.

Heavy Air Conditioner.name: Heavy Air Conditioner
Heavy Air Conditioner.description: The Heavy Air Conditioner providesClimate Controlinside of a building, making it a great addition to any outpost located in aDesert. A connection providing at least 250electricityis required to use the Heavy Air Conditioner.

Heavy Flamethrower.name: Heavy Flamethrower
