Heavy Flamethrower.description: The Heavy Flamethrower is a heavy dutyBiofuel-powered flamethrowerLegendary Weapon. It can be purchased at theBio-lab.

Heavy Heater.name: Heavy Heater
Heavy Heater.description: The Heavy Heater providesClimate Controlinside of a building, making it a great addition to any outpost located in aArctic. A connection providing at least 250 units ofPoweris required to use the Heavy Heater.

High-Quality Fertilizer.name: High-Quality Fertilizer
High-Quality Fertilizer.description: High-Quality Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the yield of grown crops. When applied, Crop Yield is increased by 50% and Crop Growth Speed is slowed by 25% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.

Hitching Post.name: Hitching Post
Hitching Post.description: The Hitching Post is a deployable item that can be deployed and used to hitch up tamedMountsusing aHitching Rope.

Honey.name: Honey
Honey.description: Honey produced fromHoneycombwith theMortar and Pestleor theBeehive Extractor. The Mortar and Pestle produces 1x Honey per 2x Honeycomb and the Beehive Extractor produces 1x Honey for 1x Honeycomb.

Honeycomb.name: Honeycomb
Honeycomb.description: Honeycomb can be found in wild beehives and cave beehives, the hives need to be destroyed with a ballistic or melee weapon. Honeycomb can also be produced in a domesticBeehive.

Honeycomb Bar.name: Honeycomb Bar
Honeycomb Bar.description: A sweet and tasty snack for your travels, long lasting effects and easily crafted.

Honey Glazed Pastry.name: Honey Glazed Pastry
Honey Glazed Pastry.description: Honey Glazed Pastry is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Honey Mead.name: Honey Mead
Honey Mead.description: Honey Mead is a mid-game beverage made from Honey, Red Berry and Yeast that greatly increases stamina and stamina regeneration.

Honey Smoked Bacon.name: Honey Smoked Bacon
Honey Smoked Bacon.description: Honey Smoked Bacon is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Honey Tea.name: Honey Tea
Honey Tea.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filledLiquid Containersuch as aThermosandHoney.

Hot Cocoa.name: Hot Cocoa
Hot Cocoa.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filledLiquid Containersuch as aThermosandCocoa Seeds.

Hot Coffee.name: Hot Coffee
Hot Coffee.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filledLiquid Containersuch as aThermosandCoffee Beans.

Hot Coffee with Cream.name: Hot Coffee with Cream
Hot Coffee with Cream.description: Hot Coffee with Cream is a late-game hot beverage similar toHot Coffee, but with increased maximum stamina, increased stamina regeneration and a shorter buff duration of 5 minutes.

Hot Tea.name: Hot Tea
Hot Tea.description: Mid-game warm beverage made by combining a filledLiquid Containersuch as aThermosandTea.

Hunting.name: Hunting
Hunting.description: Hunting is an important task for most Icarus prospectors. It provides a source ofFoodItems, but also a number ofResourcesessential to survival.

Husk: Extermination.name: Husk: Extermination
Husk: Extermination.description: EXTERMINATE AND RESEARCH THE NATIVE SCORPION

Hyena Bait.name: Hyena Bait
Hyena Bait.description: Hyena Bait is a single-useCrafted Resourceused to attract and captureWild Hyenaswhen used with aSnare Trap. Hyena Bait does not decay and can only be used inDesertandVolcanicBiomes. Stacks up to ten.

Hyena Rug.name: Hyena Rug
Hyena Rug.description: Hyena Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Hyena Trophy.name: Hyena Trophy
Hyena Trophy.description: Hyena Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Ice.name: Ice
Ice.description: Like stone, prospectors can harvest individual pieces by hand while in theArctic. However, it is much more efficient to gather Ice from snowpack with aShovel.Deep Freezerscan also be used to generate Ice.

Ice Box.name: Ice Box
Ice Box.description: The Ice Box will slow the decay of food placed inside, increasing the time until food spoils by 6x when filled withIce. Items in Ice Box reduce their spoil rate by 500% and the container has 12 inventory slots.

IC-001 Extractor.name: IC-001 Extractor
IC-001 Extractor.description: This device is used to extractExoticsfrom Exotic Deposits. It requires theIC-001 Prototype Power Sourceto operate and can extract approximately 330 exotics per power source. The speed of the IC-001 Extractor is the same as theElectric Extractor. Due to a bug, the IC-001 Extractor will operate at the same speed as theBiofuel Extractor.

IC-001 Prototype Power Source.name: IC-001 Prototype Power Source
IC-001 Prototype Power Source.description: The IC-001 Prototype Power Source is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Station. It is used to power theIC-001 Extractor. It can be used to extract 330 exotics before depleting and has a stack size of one.

Ignari Trophy.name: Ignari Trophy
Ignari Trophy.description: Ignari Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Inaris \"Reaper\" Sickle.name: Inaris "Reaper" Sickle
Inaris \"Reaper\" Sickle.description: The Inaris "Reaper" Sickle is aSeedand plant harvestingSicklethat can be unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect.

Industrial 2-Seater Couch.name: Industrial 2-Seater Couch
Industrial 2-Seater Couch.description: A minimalist Industrial 2-Seater Couch with metal arms that seats two people.

Industrial Bookshelf.name: Industrial Bookshelf
Industrial Bookshelf.description: The Industrial Bookshelf is made from metal, does not have item slots and is part of the industrialist range of furniture.

Industrial Display Cabinet.name: Industrial Display Cabinet
Industrial Display Cabinet.description: A minimalist Industrial Display Cabinet with 25 item slots

Industrial Dresser.name: Industrial Dresser
Industrial Dresser.description: A minimalist Industrial Dresser with 10 item slots.

Industrial Wardrobe.name: Industrial Wardrobe
Industrial Wardrobe.description: A minimalist Industrial Wardrobe with 10 item slots

Inert Volatile Substance.name: Inert Volatile Substance
Inert Volatile Substance.description: Inert Volatile Substance is the byproduct ofVolatile Substance. With it no longer in its potent form, it is best thrown away/destroyed (destroying grants 1Salt).

Infected Bark.name: Infected Bark
Infected Bark.description: A piece ofWoodwarped beyond recognition that can be taken to anOrganic Residue CleanserorBiofuel Bio-Cleanerto be turned into fiveEpoxyper bark.

Infrasonic Relay Upgrade.name: Infrasonic Relay Upgrade
Infrasonic Relay Upgrade.description: The Infrasonic Relay Upgrade grants Prospectors access toOperationslocked behind encoded signals.Operationsare a variation of traditionalMissionsthat are started inOpen Worlds. Upon completing an Operation, Prospectors will be granted Ren () andExotics/Volatile Exoticsfor their efforts (rewards vary per Operation and is affected by Open World difficulty). To accessEncrypted Signals, Prospectors will need to craft anEncrypted Satellite Upgrade.

International Flag.name: International Flag
International Flag.description: The International Flag is a deployable flag pole for decorating a base and supplying a small boost toCoziness.

Ion Backpack.name: Ion Backpack
Ion Backpack.description: This backpack is specifically designed to benefit players moving into Electronics inTier 3andTier 4, with notable increases in copper, gold, and platinum yields when mining.

Jaguar Rug.name: Jaguar Rug
Jaguar Rug.description: Jaguar Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Jaguar Trophy.name: Jaguar Trophy
Jaguar Trophy.description: Jaguar Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Jarred Honey.name: Jarred Honey
Jarred Honey.description: Jarred Honey is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Javelin Launcher.name: Javelin Launcher
Javelin Launcher.description: The Javelin Launcher is aLegendary Weaponthat is a largeCrossbowthat firesJavelinsfor ammunition instead ofBolts. It can be purchased at theBio-lab.

Kea Trophy.name: Kea Trophy
Kea Trophy.description: Kea Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Kiwifruit.name: Kiwifruit
Kiwifruit.description: Kiwifruit are a fresh fruit that can be eaten raw for a small boost in stamina and resistance to cave sickness or used in additionalFoodrecipes.

Kiwifruit Jam.name: Kiwifruit Jam
Kiwifruit Jam.description: Kiwifruit Jam is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Kiwifruit Sorbet.name: Kiwifruit Sorbet
Kiwifruit Sorbet.description: Kiwifruit Sorbet is late-gameFoodthat when consumed provides a boost to stamina, experience gained and resistance to cave sickness.

Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet.name: Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet
Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet.description: The Kiwi Fruit Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Kiwifruit seeds, which then can be planted inDirt MoundsorCrop Plotsto growKiwifruit.

Komodo Trophy.name: Komodo Trophy
Komodo Trophy.description: Komodo Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Kumara.name: Kumara
Kumara.description: Kumara is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Kumara Farming Packet.name: Kumara Farming Packet
Kumara Farming Packet.description: The Kumara Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Kumara seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Large Advanced Aquarium.name: Large Advanced Aquarium
Large Advanced Aquarium.description: The Large Advanced Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Large Advanced Aquarium will not spoil so long as it is connected to a power network providing at least 1,000 units ofPowerand a water network providing at least 750 units ofWater. The Large Advanced Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. The Large Advanced Aquarium can store 12 fish.

Large Beehive Expansion.name: Large Beehive Expansion
Large Beehive Expansion.description: ABeekeepingexpansion to the smallBeehiveto increase inventory slots by 6. Requires theSmall Beehive Expansionto be installed first. Added through the Beehive GUI

Large Water Trough.name: Large Water Trough
Large Water Trough.description: The Large Water Trough is an upgrade to theWater Troughthat allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected toWaterusing aWater Pipe Tool. The Large Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network likeWater BarrelsorMetal Rain Reservoirs.

Larkwell Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Bolt Bundle will add 25xLarkwell Martinez Bolts to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Charged Bolt Bundle will add 25xLarkwell Martinez Charged Bolts to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Explosive Bolt Bundle will add 25xLarkwell Martinez Explosive Bolts to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Larkwell Martinez Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Due to the one-time use payload, these bolts cannot be recovered once fired.

Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Explosive Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Due to the one-time use payload, these bolts cannot be recovered once fired.

Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen.name: Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen
Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen.description: Filled at any water source, including aRain Reservoir, the Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen is water tight and will not leak. The Larkwell Martinez Heated Canteen remains filled between Prospects with the added ability to raise the Prospectors core temperature when consumed, making it a useful upgrade to theShengong 'Hulu' Canteen.

Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack.name: Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack
Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack.description: The Larkwell Martinez Mercenary Backpack is a must need for the scatter gun fan.

Larkwell Martinez Oxygen Tank.name: Larkwell Martinez Oxygen Tank
Larkwell Martinez Oxygen Tank.description: It is worth noting that this Oxygen Container takes 65Oxiteto fill at aOxite Dissolverand will last just as long as aShengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank, but comes with the bonus of increased health regeneration and exposure resistance. Will remain filled between Prospects.

Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt.name: Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt
Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt.description: The Larkwell Martinez Piercing Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass.

Larkwell Martinez Sickle.name: Larkwell Martinez Sickle
Larkwell Martinez Sickle.description: When using a Sickle, the Prospector will gain a significant increase in a givenPlant Resource, when compared to picking that resource by hand.

Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack.name: Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack
Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack.description: The Larkwell Martinez Tactical Backpack is a massive boost to suit inventory.

Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle.name: Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle
Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle.description: Consuming the Larkwell Piercing Bolt Bundle will add 25xLarkwell Martinez Piercing Bolts to the Prospectors inventory, must be consumed after dropping into a prospect. Consumed bolt bundles/remaining bolts cannot be taken back to the space station. Bolt bundles that have not been consumed can be taken back to the space station for use in another prospect.

Lava Broodling Trophy.name: Lava Broodling Trophy
Lava Broodling Trophy.description: Lava Broodling Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Lava Survival Inhaler.name: Lava Survival Inhaler
Lava Survival Inhaler.description: The Lava Survival Inhaler is aMedicinethat boosts resistance to fire, increases health regeneration and exposure resistance while in a volcanic region. It also reduces water consumption.

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod
Lightning Rod.description: The Lightning Rod is used to redirect lightning strikes from hitting buildings.

Lightweight Frame Attachment.name: Lightweight Frame Attachment
Lightweight Frame Attachment.description: Lightweight Frame Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Light Automatic Carbine.name: Light Automatic Carbine
Light Automatic Carbine.description: The Light Automatic Carbine is a semi-automatic rifle the fires pistolAmmunitionsuch asArmor Piercing,Explosive,Incendiary,Obsidianor regularPistol Rounds.

Lily Farming Packet.name: Lily Farming Packet
Lily Farming Packet.description: The Lily Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Lily seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Localized Terraforming Device.name: Localized Terraforming Device
Localized Terraforming Device.description: The Localized Terraforming Device is aDeployabledevice used to restore trees to the Icarus landscape. It is powered byElectricityand charged up for use withCondensed EnzymesorSynthetic Enzymes. Once charged, the device is triggered and creates a localized storm cloud around the device that once cleared, reveals newly restored trees.

Lowburn Module.name: Lowburn Module
Lowburn Module.description: This module increases fire resistance by 50% when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot, reducing the amount of damage received when on fire. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Lowburn Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The resistance increase from each Lowburn Module will stack and will grant near immunity to fire if four are equipped.

Luxury Chicken Coop.name: Luxury Chicken Coop
Luxury Chicken Coop.description: The Luxury Chicken Coop is a luxury red deployable building that housesChickensand provides a place for them to layEggs. When chickens are within proximity to the coop, their eggs will appear in the coop's inventory instead of being laid on the ground.

Mass Dampener Module.name: Mass Dampener Module
Mass Dampener Module.description: This module increases movement speed by 10% when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Mass Dampeners may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit. The speed increase from each Mass Dampener Module will stack and will further increase movement speed.

Material Processor.name: Material Processor
Material Processor.description: The Material Processor serves as a much faster and more advancedTier 4version of theMortar and Pestlethat uses electricity to craft items.

Medical Satchel.name: Medical Satchel
Medical Satchel.description: The Medical Satchel is a 12 slot satchel dedicated to storing medical supplies such asBandages,Splintsand otherMedicine. The satchel takes up one inventory or hotbar slot.

Melee Damage Attachment.name: Melee Damage Attachment
Melee Damage Attachment.description: Melee Damage Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Melon Smoked Giant Steak.name: Melon Smoked Giant Steak
Melon Smoked Giant Steak.description: Melon Smoked Giant Steak is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Metal Rain Reservoir.name: Metal Rain Reservoir
Metal Rain Reservoir.description: Fill rate is defined by the total excess water available, the flow rate for the water storage unit, and the number of storage units connected to the network. If there are multiple water storage units connected to a single network, the total excess is divided amongst them all - if they are able to be filled.Ex: if a network is producing 2,500 excess water and there are 2 Metal Rain Reservoirs that can be filled, the fill rate for each will be 1,000.

Metal Water Trough.name: Metal Water Trough
Metal Water Trough.description: The Metal Water Trough is a decorative upgrade to theWater Troughthat allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected toWaterusing aWater Pipe Tool, similar to theLarge Water Trough. The Metal Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network likeWater BarrelsorMetal Rain Reservoirs.

MicroMeal.name: MicroMeal
MicroMeal.description: MicroMeal is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect: 'Emergency Rations'. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger. It is a one time use emergency ration to stave off starvation.

Migrating Sands.name: Migrating Sands
Migrating Sands.description: INVESTIGATE AN ANOMALY  IN THE DESERT

Milk Pail.name: Milk Pail
Milk Pail.description: Milk Pail is a container for liquidMilk. It holds 5 litres of Milk and unlike theGlass Milk Bottle, the Milk will spoil over time. Once the Milk has spoiled, the Milk Pail will empty and be available for reuse.

Moa Trophy.name: Moa Trophy
Moa Trophy.description: Moa Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Mortar and Pestle.name: Mortar and Pestle
Mortar and Pestle.description: The Mortar and Pestle is an early-game crafting station that allows prospectors to craft several usefulResourcesand precursor materials, including but not limited to:Steel Bloom,Epoxy,Tree Sap,Carbon Paste,Organic Resin, andGunpowder.

Mountaineering Animal Feed.name: Mountaineering Animal Feed
Mountaineering Animal Feed.description: Mountaineering Animal Feed is anAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Mountaineering Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Mountaineering Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Mushroom Farming Packet.name: Mushroom Farming Packet
Mushroom Farming Packet.description: The Mushroom Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Mushroom seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Mushroom Omelette.name: Mushroom Omelette
Mushroom Omelette.description: Mushroom Omelette is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

MXC Campfire.name: MXC Campfire
MXC Campfire.description: The MXC Campfire is similar to aCampfire, only elevated to decrease the odds of Prospectors accidentally setting themselves on fire.

MXC Camping Cooker.name: MXC Camping Cooker
MXC Camping Cooker.description: The MXC Camping Cooker is a portable version of thePotbelly Stovethat is purchased from theWorkshopon the Space Station and powered byHydrazine. It does not require shelter to operate.

MXC Camping Heater.name: MXC Camping Heater
MXC Camping Heater.description: The MXC Camping Heater is a portable heat source for use in cold regions such as theArcticthat can be purchased from theWorkshopon the Space Station.

MXC Cot.name: MXC Cot
MXC Cot.description: The MXC Cot is a portable ready-madeBedthat can be purchased from theWorkshopor brought down to the planet usingOrbital Exchange Interface.

MXC Crate.name: MXC Crate
MXC Crate.description: The MXC Crate is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect. Similar to theMedium Iron Crate, the MXC Crate does not require shelter. Has 25 slots.

MXC Firewhacker.name: MXC Firewhacker
MXC Firewhacker.description: The MXC Firewhacker is the Workshop equivalent of aFire Whackerwith increased durability and reduced stamina consumption when used.

MXC Fuel Canister.name: MXC Fuel Canister
MXC Fuel Canister.description: The MXC Fuel Canister is purchased from theWorkshopon the Space Station and is used forBiofuelstorage. It comes prefilled with fuel when purchased and can be refilled at theBiofuel Composter,Electric Composteror by interacting with aPortable Biofuel Tankdeployed on the ground. It can be taken back to Orbit and will remain filled, allowing the Prospector to use it across multiple prospects. It does not fill when returned to station. It holds 10 liters of Biofuel.

MXC Hydrazine Canister.name: MXC Hydrazine Canister
MXC Hydrazine Canister.description: The MXC Hydrazine Canister is purchased from theWorkshopon the Space Station and stores 10,000 litres of hydrazine. The fuel is used in several other MXC devices by placing the canister in the device's inventory slot. The fuel canister cannot be refilled.

MXC Sickle.name: MXC Sickle
MXC Sickle.description: When using a Sickle, the Prospector will gain a significant increase in a givenPlant Resource, when compared to picking that resource by hand.

Natural Rustic Sign.name: Natural Rustic Sign
Natural Rustic Sign.description: A Natural Rustic Sign made of wood.

Needler Trophy.name: Needler Trophy
Needler Trophy.description: Needler Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Noise Suppression Attachment.name: Noise Suppression Attachment
Noise Suppression Attachment.description: Noise Suppression Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Noxious Crust.name: Noxious Crust
Noxious Crust.description: Noxious Crust is a by-product of mining using Miasmic Tools that can be taken to anOrganic Residue CleanserorBiofuel Bio-Cleanerto be turned into variousMinerals.

Nutrition Attachment.name: Nutrition Attachment
Nutrition Attachment.description: The Nutrition Attachment is an armor alteration that adds an extra stomach slot forFoodand increases the duration of foodStatus Effects.

Obsidian.name: Obsidian
Obsidian.description: Glass formed from the belly of the earth, as chunks of solid lava. Obsidian is found in theVolcanicBiomein Icarus. In order to collect it, one needs to first break it apart using aSledgehammer.

Obsidian Bolt.name: Obsidian Bolt
Obsidian Bolt.description: The Obsidian Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Obsidian Javelin.name: Obsidian Javelin
Obsidian Javelin.description:
The Obsidian Javelin is a variant of theObsidian Spearthat can only be thrown. Deals fire damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire. A list of Fauna that are weak to fire can be viewedhere. When the Burning modifier does proc, periodic fire damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds.
Fauna with:

Omnidirectional Worklamp.name: Omnidirectional Worklamp
Omnidirectional Worklamp.description: The Omnidirectional Worklamp provides lighting for a Prospector's base. Requires 150 units ofpowerto function.

Omni Animal Feed.name: Omni Animal Feed
Omni Animal Feed.description: Omni Animal Feed is anAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Omni Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Omni Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Orbital Exchange Interface.name: Orbital Exchange Interface
Orbital Exchange Interface.description: The Orbital Exchange Interface is required to sendExotics/Stabilized Exoticsback to Orbit and to receive payment for them.Volatile Raw Exotics must be cleaned at aOrganic Residue Cleanserbefore they can be sent up.Must be placed outdoors.

Organic Residue Cleanser.name: Organic Residue Cleanser
Organic Residue Cleanser.description: The Organic Residue Cleanser is aTier 4deployable cleaning device used to clean and processVolatile Raw Exotics, frozen and infected materials and organic materials collected from world bosess.

Organic Resin.name: Organic Resin
Organic Resin.description: Organic Resin is used in crafting of items such asElectronics, andComposite Paste, making it a critical component inTier 4crafting.

Ornate Water Trough.name: Ornate Water Trough
Ornate Water Trough.description: The Ornate Water Trough is a decorative upgrade to theWater Troughthat allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected toWaterusing aWater Pipe Tool, similar to theLarge Water Trough. The Ornate Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network likeWater BarrelsorMetal Rain Reservoirs.

Oxidizer.name: Oxidizer
Oxidizer.description: Early game , unlocking this provides for an incredible boost in efficiency vs the initial need to consume raw Oxite to maintain oxygen supply. Once built and placed, the Oxidizer is used by adding Oxite (10 max) and once the leather balloon is filled, oxygen can be consumed by activating the balloon. The balloon holds up to 1.00L (1000u) of breathable oxygen.

Oxite.name: Oxite
Oxite.description: Oxite is an one of the most preciousMineralsfound on the surface of Icarus. Prospectors require a steady supply ofOxygento survive, and Oxite is a solidified mix of water and oxygen.

Oxite Cluster Lamp.name: Oxite Cluster Lamp
Oxite Cluster Lamp.description: The Oxite Cluster Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Oxite Dissolver.name: Oxite Dissolver
Oxite Dissolver.description: More efficient than theOxidizer, this is used in tandem withOxygen Containersplaced into the dissolver. The front slots of the deployable only acceptOxygen Containersand will automatically fill said containers fromOxiteplaced into the machine when supplied withSulfur. A stack of sulfur will last sixteen minutes and forty seconds, producing 0.1 Liters of Oxygen every two seconds.

Oxite Geode Lamp.name: Oxite Geode Lamp
Oxite Geode Lamp.description: The Oxite Geode Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Oxite Monolith Lamp.name: Oxite Monolith Lamp
Oxite Monolith Lamp.description: The Oxite Monolith Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

Oxygel.name: Oxygel
Oxygel.description: Oxygel is aConsumablethat providesOxygenwhen consumed. It is a one time use emergency ration of Oxygen.

Oxygen.name: Oxygen
Oxygen.description: Oxygen is one of the three survival meters that must be maintained by prospectors while attempting aProspecton Icarus.

Oxygen Bladder.name: Oxygen Bladder
Oxygen Bladder.description: Oxygen Bladder is filled at theOxite Dissolver, and is equipped in anEnvirosuitoxygen slot enabling automaticOxygenreplenishment. It holds 1000 oxygen units.

Oxygen Tank.name: Oxygen Tank
Oxygen Tank.description: The Oxygen Tank is filled at theOxite DissolverandMetal Oxite Dissolverand is equipped in anEnvirosuitoxygen slot enabling automaticOxygenreplenishment. It holds 5000 oxygen units, 5 times as much as aOxygen Bladder; great for long trips across Icarus.

Paints.name: Paints
Paints.description: Paints are used make several differentPaintingsthat can be hung on variousFrames.

Pastry.name: Pastry
Pastry.description: Pastry is a component in making food, such asCrumbed Saltwater FilletandMeat Pie.

Patcher II Module.name: Patcher II Module
Patcher II Module.description: This module increases the number of available inventory slots by 5 when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Patcher II Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit.

Patcher I Module.name: Patcher I Module
Patcher I Module.description: This module increases the number of available inventory slots by 2 when equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Patcher I Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit.

Pavlova.name: Pavlova
Pavlova.description: Pavlova is late-gameFoodthat when consumed provides a considerable boost to health, stamina, speed, resistance to cave sickness and a chance to mine additional stone.

Pheromone Module.name: Pheromone Module
Pheromone Module.description: This module increases the movement speed and maximum stamina of mounts near the user. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Pheromone Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the benefit received from the equipped modules.

Pickled Avocado.name: Pickled Avocado
Pickled Avocado.description: Pickled Avocado is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Pickled Avocado, which increases maximumStamina, reduces food consumption, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Avocado does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Carrot.name: Pickled Carrot
Pickled Carrot.description: Pickled Carrot is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Pickled Carrot, which improves Projectile Damage and shared experience gain. Pickled Carrot does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Eggs.name: Pickled Eggs
Pickled Eggs.description: Pickled Eggs is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Pickled Eggs, which increases maximumStamina, increases the amount ofStonefound while mining, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Eggs does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Freshwater Fillet.name: Pickled Freshwater Fillet
Pickled Freshwater Fillet.description: Pickled Freshwater Fillet is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Pickled Freshwater Fillet, which increases maximumHealth, improvesStaminaand Health regeneration, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Freshwater Fillet does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Pickled Tomato.name: Pickled Tomato
Pickled Tomato.description: Pickled Tomato is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Pickled Tomato, which increases maximumStamina, improvesHealthregeneration, and improves shared experience gain. Pickled Tomato does not decay and is therefore useful for long-term storage.

Plain Jerky.name: Plain Jerky
Plain Jerky.description: Plain Jerky is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Plating Attachment.name: Plating Attachment
Plating Attachment.description: Plating Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Platinum Attachment.name: Platinum Attachment
Platinum Attachment.description: Platinum Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Platinum Bolt.name: Platinum Bolt
Platinum Bolt.description: The Platinum Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Platinum Javelin.name: Platinum Javelin
Platinum Javelin.description: The Platinum Javelin is a variant of thePlatinum Spearthat can only be thrown; a substantial upgrade to the Tier 2 Javelins.

Platinum Lightning Rod.name: Platinum Lightning Rod
Platinum Lightning Rod.description: The Platinum Lightning Rod absorbs lightning strikes fromWeather Eventsand optionally captures the energy and directs it to a connectedElectricitynetwork.

Platinum Sheath.name: Platinum Sheath
Platinum Sheath.description: Platinum Sheath is used in a variety of high-end resources and components and is crafted in batches of 4.

Platinum Shield.name: Platinum Shield
Platinum Shield.description: The Platinum Shield is crafted at theForgeorFoundrywith the following resources:

Platinum Shovel.name: Platinum Shovel
Platinum Shovel.description: The Platinum Shovel is an upgrade to theShovel, offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability. Like its predecessor, it can be used to createDirt Mounds(right-click), harvestIce/Dirt/Sand(left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in theArctic/Volcanicbiomes on Icarus.

Platinum Sickle.name: Platinum Sickle
Platinum Sickle.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs,Reed Flower,Wheat, etc.Sicklessignificantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

Player Tracker Module.name: Player Tracker Module
Player Tracker Module.description: When this module is equipped in anEnvirosuitmodule slot it allows a prospector to see other prospectors on the map. It can be researched and created on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop.

Pockets Attachment.name: Pockets Attachment
Pockets Attachment.description: Pockets Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Poisoned Animal Bait.name: Poisoned Animal Bait
Poisoned Animal Bait.description: Poisoned Animal Bait is used to lure random predators when left in an open area, poisoningFaunawho choose to consume it. The blueprint is unlocked account-wide after completing the prospectWet Work: Extermination. Stacks up to 5.

Poison Sack Lure.name: Poison Sack Lure
Poison Sack Lure.description: The Poison Sack Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Poison Sack Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Polar Bear Rug.name: Polar Bear Rug
Polar Bear Rug.description: Polar Bear Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Polar Bear Trophy.name: Polar Bear Trophy
Polar Bear Trophy.description: Polar Bear Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Potato and Carrot Fries.name: Potato and Carrot Fries
Potato and Carrot Fries.description: Potato and Carrot Fries is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Potato Farming Packet.name: Potato Farming Packet
Potato Farming Packet.description: The Potato Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Potato seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Potbelly Stove.name: Potbelly Stove
Potbelly Stove.description: The Potbelly Stove is an early- to mid-gamecooking benchthat provides a more efficient way to cook raw foods than theCampfire. The Potbelly Stove introduces new, multi-ingredient recipes with unique status effects. It is also an exceptional source of heat.

Powered Creature Deterrent.name: Powered Creature Deterrent
Powered Creature Deterrent.description: While useful for protecting Prospectors from predators, the Powered Creature Deterrent also prevents the spawning ofFaunaso be aware that deer, pronghorns, rabbits, chamois, or other animals will not spawn within the indicated radius.

Prometheus.name: Prometheus
Prometheus.description: PrometheusGeneral informationLocationSystem: Proxima CentauriStar: Wolf 1061Gas giant: MinosMoon: Wolf 1061ca / IcarusDifficultyAvailable by PurchasingNew Frontiers Expansion

Pronghorn Trophy.name: Pronghorn Trophy
Pronghorn Trophy.description: Pronghorn Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Prospector Field Guide.name: Prospector Field Guide
Prospector Field Guide.description: The Prospector Field Guide is an in-game tool (default keybind:J) designed to provide players with comprehensive information on bestiaries, fishing records, and craftable items. This guide will be expanded to include detailed entries for every item, offering valuable insights to improve the crafting experience.

Protection Module.name: Protection Module
Protection Module.description: This module increases the user's resistance to wounds received from aggressive Fauna, specifically the Basic Wound + Deep Wound debuff. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Protection Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will grant near immunity to Basic/Deep wounds if four are equipped.

Pumpkin Farming Packet.name: Pumpkin Farming Packet
Pumpkin Farming Packet.description: The Pumpkin Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Pumpkin seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Pygmy Lop Trophy.name: Pygmy Lop Trophy
Pygmy Lop Trophy.description: Pygmy Lop Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Rabbit Trophy.name: Rabbit Trophy
Rabbit Trophy.description: Rabbit Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Racing Saddle.name: Racing Saddle
Racing Saddle.description: The Racing Saddle is a saddle forMountsthat has a racing theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

Rain Reservoir.name: Rain Reservoir
Rain Reservoir.description: Rain Reservoirs can be crafted from the Crafting Bench with the following resources once the appropriate blueprint point has been spent:

Ranged Attachment Pack.name: Ranged Attachment Pack
Ranged Attachment Pack.description: Ranged Attachment Pack is aTier 3Techneeded for theAlteration Benchthat allows Prospectors to alter their ranged weapons withAttachment Packs.

Reaping Attachment.name: Reaping Attachment
Reaping Attachment.description: Reaping Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Recovery Attachment.name: Recovery Attachment
Recovery Attachment.description: The Recovery Attachment is an armor alteration that reduces the duration of the effects of parasites, poison, bacterial afflications and physical trauma.

Redback Trophy.name: Redback Trophy
Redback Trophy.description: Redback Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Reed Farming Packet.name: Reed Farming Packet
Reed Farming Packet.description: The Reed Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Reed seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Reed Flower Lure.name: Reed Flower Lure
Reed Flower Lure.description: The Reed Flower Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Reed Flower Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Refrigerator.name: Refrigerator
Refrigerator.description: The Refrigerator will slow the decay of food placed inside, increasing the time until food spoils by 8x when powered. Requires 500 units ofpowerto function. Has 24 slots.

Regenerative Combat Inhaler.name: Regenerative Combat Inhaler
Regenerative Combat Inhaler.description: The Regenerative Combat Inhaler is aMedicinethat boosts health regeneration and resistance to basic and deep wounds.

Repair Speed Attachment.name: Repair Speed Attachment
Repair Speed Attachment.description: Repair Speed Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Rhubarb.name: Rhubarb
Rhubarb.description: Rhubarb is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Rhubarb Farming Packet.name: Rhubarb Farming Packet
Rhubarb Farming Packet.description: The Rhubarb Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Rhubarb seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Ripe Coconut.name: Ripe Coconut
Ripe Coconut.description: If a Prospector lets aYoung Coconutdecay, it will ripen into a ripe coconut. Let a ripe coconut decay, and it will ripen again into aMature Coconut.

Roast Chicken.name: Roast Chicken
Roast Chicken.description: Roast Chicken is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Roast Squash.name: Roast Squash
Roast Squash.description: Roast Squash is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Roat Trophy.name: Roat Trophy
Roat Trophy.description: Roat Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Rubberized Attachment.name: Rubberized Attachment
Rubberized Attachment.description: Rubberized Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Rubber Lure.name: Rubber Lure
Rubber Lure.description: The Rubber Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Rubber Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Rustic 2-Seater Couch.name: Rustic 2-Seater Couch
Rustic 2-Seater Couch.description: The Rustic 2-Seater Couch is a rustic item that can seat 2 prospectors.

Rustic 3-Seater Couch.name: Rustic 3-Seater Couch
Rustic 3-Seater Couch.description: The Rustic 3-Seater Couch is a rustic item that can seat 3 prospectors.

Rustic Bookshelf.name: Rustic Bookshelf
Rustic Bookshelf.description: The Rustic Bookshelf allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Cabinet.name: Rustic Cabinet
Rustic Cabinet.description: The Rustic Cabinet allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Candles.name: Rustic Candles
Rustic Candles.description: Four types of Rustic Candles can be deployed by holding the candle and selecting R for the rotary menu. Two recipes create the candles using eitherAnimal FatorBeeswax. Holding R when viewing the candle will bring up the fuel container which will either be Animal Fat or Beeswax.

Rustic Chicken Coop.name: Rustic Chicken Coop
Rustic Chicken Coop.description: The Rustic Chicken Coop is a deployable building that housesChickensand provides a place for them to layEggs. When chickens are within proximity to the coop, their eggs will appear in the coop's inventory instead of being laid on the ground.

Rustic Dresser.name: Rustic Dresser
Rustic Dresser.description: The Rustic Dresser allows prospectors to store 10 items

Rustic Icarus Statue.name: Rustic Icarus Statue
Rustic Icarus Statue.description: The Rustic Icarus Statue is a decorative statue

Rustic Nightstand.name: Rustic Nightstand
Rustic Nightstand.description: The Rustic Nightstand is available in 5 varieties when holding item selet R for the variations. The Rustic Nightstand allows prospectors to store 5 items.

Rustic Pot.name: Rustic Pot
Rustic Pot.description: The Rustic Pot has two variations that can be selected by holding item and holding R. The item is decorative only and cannot store items

Rustic Stool.name: Rustic Stool
Rustic Stool.description: The Rustic Stool seats one prospector.

Rustic Wardrobe.name: Rustic Wardrobe
Rustic Wardrobe.description: The Rustic Wardrobe is a large wardrobe with 10 item slots

Salt.name: Salt
Salt.description: Salt is aMineraland can be found in the wilderness in similar areas toSulfur,OxiteandSilica.

Saltwater Fillet Sashimi.name: Saltwater Fillet Sashimi
Saltwater Fillet Sashimi.description: Saltwater Fillet Sashimi is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Sand.name: Sand
Sand.description: Sand is aResourcefound on the surface of Icarus inDesertbiomes. Sand is collected with aShoveland can be used to makeGlassin aConcrete Furnace/Electric Furnace.

Sandworm Brazier.name: Sandworm Brazier
Sandworm Brazier.description: The Sandworm Brazier is a deployable and decorative source ofHeatandLightmade from the remains of aSandworm.

Sandworm Javelin.name: Sandworm Javelin
Sandworm Javelin.description: The Sandworm Javelin is a variant of theSandworm Spearthat can only be thrown. Considering the Sandworm Javelin deals the same amount of damage as aBone Javelin, the Sandworm Javelin is overshadowed by higher-tier javelins and is not worth the effort. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to twenty.

Sandworm Scale Saddle.name: Sandworm Scale Saddle
Sandworm Scale Saddle.description: The Sandworm Scale Saddle is a saddle forMountsthat has a sandworm theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

Sandworm Trophy.name: Sandworm Trophy
Sandworm Trophy.description: The Sandworm Trophy is a decorative deployable that can be placed on a wall to display the head of a once mightySandworm.

Sauteed Rhubarb.name: Sauteed Rhubarb
Sauteed Rhubarb.description: Sauteed Rhubarb is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Savory Roll.name: Savory Roll
Savory Roll.description: Savory Roll is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Scoria.name: Scoria
Scoria.description: A rough-textured rock ejected from the planet's surface during volcanic activity. Scoria is found in theVolcanicBiomein Icarus. In order to collect it, one needs to first break it apart using aSledgehammer.

Scoria Brick.name: Scoria Brick
Scoria Brick.description: Scoria Bricks are a refined resource primarily used to craftScoria Brick Building Piecesat anAdvanced Masonry Bench/Electric Masonry Bench.

Scorpion Hedgehog.name: Scorpion Hedgehog
Scorpion Hedgehog.description: Scorpion Hedgehogs are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment. The recipe to craft this defensive trap is only learned after completing the prospectCarapace: Research.

Scorpion Tail Lure.name: Scorpion Tail Lure
Scorpion Tail Lure.description: The Scorpion Tail Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Scorpion Tail Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

Scorpion Trophy.name: Scorpion Trophy
Scorpion Trophy.description: Scorpion Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Scrambled Eggs.name: Scrambled Eggs
Scrambled Eggs.description: Scrambled Eggs is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Seared Mushroom.name: Seared Mushroom
Seared Mushroom.description: Seared Mushroom is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Seed Animal Feed.name: Seed Animal Feed
Seed Animal Feed.description: Seed Animal Feed is aAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to a mount to satisfyHunger. Seed Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Seed Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Seed Cracker.name: Seed Cracker
Seed Cracker.description: A snack made with just seed.

Seed Extractor.name: Seed Extractor
Seed Extractor.description: The Seed Extractor is a small deployable bench used to process fruits and plants to extractSeedsforFarming.

Seed Pouch.name: Seed Pouch
Seed Pouch.description: A leather pouch for seeds that can fit 12 full stacks ofSeeds.

Shaggy Zebra Trophy.name: Shaggy Zebra Trophy
Shaggy Zebra Trophy.description: Shaggy Zebra Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Shaped Obsidian.name: Shaped Obsidian
Shaped Obsidian.description: Shaped Obsidian is a refined resource used to craftOrganic Residue Cleansers,Obsidian Armorand a variety of Tools, Weapons, and Ammunition.

Shelter.name: Shelter
Shelter.description: Shelter is an essential condition of survival on Icarus, and governs how a prospector can withstand the frequentStormson Icarus.

Shengong \"Hulu\" Canteen.name: Shengong "Hulu" Canteen
Shengong \"Hulu\" Canteen.description: Filled at any water source, including aRain Reservoir. Similar to theCanteen, the Shengong "Hulu" Canteen is water tight and will not leak. The Shengong "Hulu" Canteen will remain filled between Prospects, making it a valuableWorkshoppurchase early on.

Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank.name: Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank
Shengong 'Liwei' O2 Tank.description: It is worth noting that this Oxygen Container takes 65Oxiteto fill at aOxite Dissolver, and will last significantly longer than anOxygen Bladder, making it one of the most valuable early game purchases in theWorkshop. Will remain filled between Prospects. It holds 6500 oxygen units making it useful for stockpile missions that require oxygen delivery.

Shepherd's Pie.name: Shepherd's Pie
Shepherd's Pie.description: Shepherd's Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Shepherd's Roll.name: Shepherd's Roll
Shepherd's Roll.description: A Shepherd's Roll is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description: The Shovel is an upgrade to theWooden Shovel, offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability. Like its predecessor, it can be used to createDirt Mounds(right-click), harvestIce/Dirt/Sand(left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in theArctic/Volcanicbiomes on Icarus.

Silencer Attachment.name: Silencer Attachment
Silencer Attachment.description: Silencer Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Simple Creature Deterrent.name: Simple Creature Deterrent
Simple Creature Deterrent.description: While useful for protecting Prospectors from predators, the Simple Creature Deterrent also prevents the spawning ofFaunaso be aware that deer, pronghorns, rabbits, chamois, or other animals will not spawn within the indicated radius.

Small Beehive Expansion.name: Small Beehive Expansion
Small Beehive Expansion.description: The Small Beehive Expansion increases the Small Beehive generic inventory slots by 6 and reduces the energy transmutation cost by 10%.

Small Blue Pouch.name: Small Blue Pouch
Small Blue Pouch.description: The Small Blue Pouch is a blue variant of theSmall Pouch, a generic six slot container that can be placed in inventory to help organize items. It does not affect the overall weight of items or carrying capacity.

Small Brick Sign.name: Small Brick Sign
Small Brick Sign.description: The Small Brick Sign is a deployable sign post available as a wall sign, floor sign or as two angled variants.

Small Composite Sign.name: Small Composite Sign
Small Composite Sign.description: The Small Composite Sign is a deployable sign post in a modern style and made fromComposites.

Small Green Pouch.name: Small Green Pouch
Small Green Pouch.description: The Small Green Pouch is a green variant of theSmall Pouch, a generic six slot container that can be placed in inventory to help organize items. It does not affect the overall weight of items or carrying capacity.

Small Pouch.name: Small Pouch
Small Pouch.description: The Small Pouch is a generic six slot container that can be placed in inventory to help organize items. It does not affect the overall weight of items or carrying capacity.

Small Red Pouch.name: Small Red Pouch
Small Red Pouch.description: The Small Red Pouch is a red variant of theSmall Pouch, a generic six slot container that can be placed in inventory to help organize items. It does not affect the overall weight of items or carrying capacity.

Smashed Avocado Toast.name: Smashed Avocado Toast
Smashed Avocado Toast.description: Smashed Avocado Toast is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs.

Smoker.name: Smoker
Smoker.description: The smoker is powered byCharcoaland gives you another way to cook longer lasting food. The smoker needs to be placed outside and gives a heat modifier.

Sniper Scope Attachment.name: Sniper Scope Attachment
Sniper Scope Attachment.description: Sniper Scope Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech. Does not give an actual scope to weapon.

Snow Leopard Rug.name: Snow Leopard Rug
Snow Leopard Rug.description: Snow Leopard Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Snow Leopard Trophy.name: Snow Leopard Trophy
Snow Leopard Trophy.description: Snow Leopard Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Snow Rabbit Trophy.name: Snow Rabbit Trophy
Snow Rabbit Trophy.description: Snow Rabbit Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Snow Stalker Trophy.name: Snow Stalker Trophy
Snow Stalker Trophy.description: Snow Stalker Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Snow Wolf Rug.name: Snow Wolf Rug
Snow Wolf Rug.description: Snow Wolf Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Snow Wolf Trophy.name: Snow Wolf Trophy
Snow Wolf Trophy.description: Snow Wolf Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Solar Panel.name: Solar Panel
Solar Panel.description: The Solar Panel generatesElectricitywhen positioned in direct sunlight. Use anElectricity Toolto connect it toBenchesto provide power. Contrary to its description, the Solar Panel needs to "see" the sun itself, not just be in a sunlit area to work. The panel will only provide power if it has an unobstructed view of the sun in the sky; anything that casts a shadow on it can interfere with power production. Solar Panel can be placed underwater.

Soy Bean Stir-Fry.name: Soy Bean Stir-Fry
Soy Bean Stir-Fry.description: Soy Bean Stir-Fry is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Splint.name: Splint
Splint.description: Splint is used to speed up the recovery of broken bones.

Spoiled Plants.name: Spoiled Plants
Spoiled Plants.description: Spoiled Plants are the byproduct of spoiled food like vegetables and fruit, and are used to craftVolatile SubstanceorBasic Fertilizerfor Crop Plots. Cannot be eaten despite having theYou Gonna Eat That?talent.

Squash Farming Packet.name: Squash Farming Packet
Squash Farming Packet.description: The Squash Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Squash seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Stabilized Exotics.name: Stabilized Exotics
Stabilized Exotics.description: Stabilized Exotics are a form of currency in theWorkshopand the stabilized state that results from processing and cleaningVolatile Raw Exoticsfound onPrometheus.

Stamina.name: Stamina
Stamina.description: Stamina is a power gauge that fuels many of the actions in Icarus. Using tools, sprinting, jumping, attacking, and crafting all require stamina.Status Effectscan increase or decrease max stamina or stamina regeneration. A prospector who runs out of stamina becomes exhausted and cannot perform stamina-consuming actions until they've regained a significant portion of their stamina.

Stealth.name: Stealth
Stealth.description: Stealth is concealment fromFaunafound on Icarus, and determines how both hostile and passive creatures react to your presence.Huntingis an important task for most Icarus prospectors. It provides a renewable source ofFoodItems, but also a number ofResourcesessential to survival.

Storm Visor Attachment.name: Storm Visor Attachment
Storm Visor Attachment.description: Storm Visor Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Strengthened Strings Attachment.name: Strengthened Strings Attachment
Strengthened Strings Attachment.description: Strengthened Strings Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Strength Boost Module.name: Strength Boost Module
Strength Boost Module.description: When equipped in a module slot of anEnvirosuit, this module increases the carry weight capacity of  Prospectors near the user, however it does not affect the wearers max carry weight. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop.

Stringy Jerky.name: Stringy Jerky
Stringy Jerky.description: Stringy Jerky is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Stryder Trophy.name: Stryder Trophy
Stryder Trophy.description: Stryder Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Stuffed Avocado.name: Stuffed Avocado
Stuffed Avocado.description: Stuffed Avocado is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Sugar Cane.name: Sugar Cane
Sugar Cane.description: Sugar Cane does not naturally spawn on Icarus and is obtainable by plantingSeedsobtained from aSugar Cane Farming Packetordered from theWorkshopthrough theOrbital Exchange Interface.

Sugar Cane Farming Packet.name: Sugar Cane Farming Packet
Sugar Cane Farming Packet.description: The Sugar Cane Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector fiveSugar CaneSeeds, which then can be planted inDirt MoundsorCrop Plotsto growPlant Resources.

Sugar Cubes.name: Sugar Cubes
Sugar Cubes.description: Sugar Cubes are an intermediate crafting resource produced by processingSugar Canein aMortar and Pestleor aMaterial Processor

Sulfur.name: Sulfur
Sulfur.description: Sulfur is aMineralfound on the surface of Icarus. Sulfur is used as a fuel source to fillOxygen Containersand it is used in crafting items likeGunpowderand theFire Extinguisher.

Super Cooled Ice.name: Super Cooled Ice
Super Cooled Ice.description: Super Cooled Ice is a resource required to makeCold Steel Ingots, a precursor resource used in making Cold SteelTools,Weapons, andAmmo.

Supplemental Filtration Attachment.name: Supplemental Filtration Attachment
Supplemental Filtration Attachment.description: Supplemental Filtration Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Supplemental Respiration Attachment.name: Supplemental Respiration Attachment
Supplemental Respiration Attachment.description: Supplemental Respiration Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theArmor Attachment Packtech.

Survival Animal Feed.name: Survival Animal Feed
Survival Animal Feed.description: Survival Animal Feed is anAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Survival Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Survival Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

Survival Backpack.name: Survival Backpack
Survival Backpack.description: The Survival Backpack is a must need when taking long trips across Icarus, fit everything you need inside for survival! Innovative storage system that mitigates injuries.

Survival Kit.name: Survival Kit
Survival Kit.description: Survival Kits are aTier 3bandage that heals basic wounds, deep wounds, frostbite and heatstrokeStatus Effects. It replaces a number of basic  items, but requires considerably more materials to craft.

Survival Module.name: Survival Module
Survival Module.description: This module increases the user's resistance to cold/hot environments, reducing the damage taken from Hypothermia/Hyperthermia. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Survival Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the users resistance to hyperthermia/hypothermia.

Suture Kit.name: Suture Kit
Suture Kit.description: A Suture Kit is used to treat a Deep Wound, Hemorrhage or Exotic Deep Wound.

Synthetic Enzymes.name: Synthetic Enzymes
Synthetic Enzymes.description: Synthetic Enzymes are a crafted variant ofCondensed Enzymesthat can be used as fuel in aLocalized Terraforming Device. UnlikeCondensed Enzymes, the synthetic version is less potent as a fuel but does not require constructing, placing or defending aVapor Condenseron anEnzyme Geyser.

Tackle Box.name: Tackle Box
Tackle Box.description: The Tackle Box is a storage deployable that can be used to store a handful of lures and caught fish. Unlike other storage deployables, the Tackle Box can be picked up with items inside and does not require shelter to be used. With 3 slots forLuresand 2 slots that will halt the spoil timer of any caught fish, the Tackle Box is a handy tool for fishing adventures.

Target Dummy.name: Target Dummy
Target Dummy.description: Target Dummys are deployable items used to test out weapons and to see their damage output when hitting hard points and weak points.

Tea Farming Packet.name: Tea Farming Packet
Tea Farming Packet.description: The Tea Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Tea seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet.name: Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet
Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet.description: Tea Smoked Freshwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Teenage Caveworm Trophy.name: Teenage Caveworm Trophy
Teenage Caveworm Trophy.description: Teenage Caveworm Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Terrenus Trophy.name: Terrenus Trophy
Terrenus Trophy.description: Terrenus Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Thermos.name: Thermos
Thermos.description: The Thermos can store water without leaking, similar to theCanteen, but can also store hot drinks which can be used to raise a Prospectors core temperature when traversing the Arctic. Hot drinks also provide a unique buff that does not take up a stomach slot. Can be used to holdHot Tea,Gorse Tea,Hot Cocoa, andHot Coffee.

The Excavator.name: The Excavator
The Excavator.description: The Excavator is a WorkshopShovelthat can be used to dig upDirt,SandandIceor used to createDirt Moundswith very high resistance to tier 6Weather Events.

Thick Woven Rug.name: Thick Woven Rug
Thick Woven Rug.description: Thick Woven Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Thin Woven Rug.name: Thin Woven Rug
Thin Woven Rug.description: Thin Woven Rugs are decorative deployables that can be placed on any ground surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from being for decorative purposes, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Titanium Attachment.name: Titanium Attachment
Titanium Attachment.description: Titanium Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

Titanium Bolt.name: Titanium Bolt
Titanium Bolt.description: The Titanium Bolt is ammunition used with aCrossbow. Like arrows and javelins, they may be recovered after being fired into the ground or an animal carcass. Crafted in batches of 5.

Titanium Javelin.name: Titanium Javelin
Titanium Javelin.description: The Titanium Javelin is a variant of theTitanium Spearthat can only be thrown and is a costly upgrade to Tier 3 Javelins.

Titanium Plate.name: Titanium Plate
Titanium Plate.description: Titanium Plate is used in a variety of high-end resources and components.

Titanium Shovel.name: Titanium Shovel
Titanium Shovel.description: The Titanium Shovel is an upgrade to thePlatinum Shovel, offering increased yield when digging and higher tool durability. Like its predecessor, it can be used to createDirt Mounds(right-click), harvestIce/Dirt/Sand(left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in theArctic/Volcanicbiomes on Icarus.

Titanium Sickle.name: Titanium Sickle
Titanium Sickle.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs,Reed Flower,Wheat,Carrots, etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

Titanium Tower Shield.name: Titanium Tower Shield
Titanium Tower Shield.description: The Titanium Tower Shield is crafted at the Foundry with the following resources:

Tomato Farming Packet.name: Tomato Farming Packet
Tomato Farming Packet.description: The Tomato Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Tomato seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

Tool Attachment Pack.name: Tool Attachment Pack
Tool Attachment Pack.description: Tool Attachment Pack is aTier 3Techneeded for theAlteration Benchthat allows Prospectors to alter their Tools withAttachment Packs.

Tracking Attachment.name: Tracking Attachment
Tracking Attachment.description: The Tracking Attachment is an armor alteration that boosts Critical Damage and allows active world bosses to be seen on the map.

Trajectory Module Attachment.name: Trajectory Module Attachment
Trajectory Module Attachment.description: Trajectory Module Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theRanged Attachment Packtech.

Tree Sap.name: Tree Sap
Tree Sap.description: Tree Sap is used in crafting of items such asEpoxy, andConcrete Mix, making this early-game resource very important throughout all aspects of crafting. Tree Sap can also by found while harvesting some plants, like the palms of theDesert.

Tusker Trophy.name: Tusker Trophy
Tusker Trophy.description: Tusker Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

Ubis Trophy.name: Ubis Trophy
Ubis Trophy.description: Ubis Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply.name: UDA Synthetic Enzymes Resource Supply
