However, it will not stop creatures that are already aggressively pursuing Prospectors, creatures spawned by Thumpers, Radars, or other mission items that have been placed or activated. Stacks up to 5.

Steel Axe.name: Steel Axe
Steel Axe.description: The Steel Axe is a mid-gameToolavailable in Icarus. Prospectors can unlock it inTier 2of theTech Tree, after reaching Level 20.

Steel Hammer.name: Steel Hammer
Steel Hammer.description: Hammers are used to repairBuilding PiecesandDeployables. Hammers are also used to upgradeBuilding Pieces. In order to do so, the Prospector must have the building pieces in their inventory prior to upgrading. To select the building material, hold R while the Hammer is equipped and select a material from the radial wheel. Once the material is selected, right clicking on a building piece will upgrade it to the selected material if the building piece is currently in the Prospectors inventory.

Steel Knife.name: Steel Knife
Steel Knife.description: The Steel Knife is an upgrade in damage and durability from theIron Knife, the Steel Knife can be used as either a melee weapon or tool. An attachment slot is available, allowing for the application ofTool Attachment Packsat anAlteration Bench/Advanced Alteration Bench.

Steel Pickaxe.name: Steel Pickaxe
Steel Pickaxe.description: The Steel pickaxe is the 3rd pickaxe prospectors can unlock during your time on Icarus and allows for the mining of denserMineralsnot obtainable with theIron PickaxeorStone Pickaxe. Like iron tools, the steel pickaxe is made and is repairable at anAnvil Bench.

Steel Spear.name: Steel Spear
Steel Spear.description: The Steel Spear is an upgrade to theIron Spearthat deals more damage/critical damage to targets and has twice the durability. Unlike theSteel Javelin, the Steel Spear cannot be thrown.

Steel Throwing Knife.name: Steel Throwing Knife
Steel Throwing Knife.description: The Steel Throwing Knife is a variant of theSteel Knifethat can be thrown. Unlike theSteel Knife, the Steel Throwing Knife cannot be used to skin fauna. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to fifty.

Stone Axe.name: Stone Axe
Stone Axe.description: The Stone Axe is used primarily for chopping down trees andSmall Trees, reducing them to usableWood. In the process of chopping apart fallen trees, a small number ofSticksmay be added to your inventory automatically.

Stone Knife.name: Stone Knife
Stone Knife.description: The first knife that can be unlocked, the Stone Knife is a fast melee weapon and doubles as a tool with any knife being necessary to skin a carcass prior to unlocking theSkinning Bench.

Stone Throwing Knife.name: Stone Throwing Knife
Stone Throwing Knife.description: The Stone Throwing Knife is a variant of theStone Knifethat can be thrown. Unlike theStone Knife, the Stone Throwing Knife cannot be used to skin fauna. Crafted in batches of 5 and stacks up to fifty.

Taxidermy Knife.name: Taxidermy Knife
Taxidermy Knife.description: The Taxidermy Knife is used for skinningFaunacarcasses, when a prospector wishes to obtain aVestigefor mounting. Skinning any carcass with a taxidermy knife grants fourBestiarypoints for the animal skinned.

Titanium Axe.name: Titanium Axe
Titanium Axe.description: The Titanium Axe is the highest tieredAxethat can be crafted while on the surface of Icarus.

Titanium Hammer.name: Titanium Hammer
Titanium Hammer.description: Hammers are used to repairBuilding PiecesandDeployables. Hammers are also used to upgradeBuilding Pieces. In order to do so, the Prospector must have the building pieces in their inventory prior to upgrading. To select the building material, hold R while the Hammer is equipped and select a material from the radial wheel. Once the material is selected, right clicking on a building piece will upgrade it to the selected material if the building piece is currently in the Prospectors inventory.

Titanium Knife.name: Titanium Knife
Titanium Knife.description: The Titanium Knife is an upgrade in damage and durability from thePlatinum Knife, the Titanium Knife can be used as either a melee weapon or tool. Unlike theTitanium Throwing Knife, the Titanium Knife cannot be thrown.

Titanium Pickaxe.name: Titanium Pickaxe
Titanium Pickaxe.description: The Titanium Pickaxe is the highest-tieredPickaxethat can be crafted while on the surface of Icarus. When combined with aTool Attachment Pack/Advanced Tool Attachment Pack, the Titanium Pickaxe surpasses theInaris "Neves" Pickaxein terms of mining.

Titanium Spear.name: Titanium Spear
Titanium Spear.description: The Titanium Spear is the firstSpearavailable to prospectors once they reach Tier 4 and serves as an, albeit expensive, upgrade to its Tier 3 counterparts. Unlike theTitanium Javelin, the Titanium Spear cannot be thrown.

Titanium Throwing Knife.name: Titanium Throwing Knife
Titanium Throwing Knife.description: The Titanium Throwing Knife is a variant of theTitanium Knifethat can be thrown. Unlike theTitanium Knife, the Titanium Throwing Knife cannot be used to skin fauna. Crafted in batches of five and stacks up to fifty.

Wood Hammer.name: Wood Hammer
Wood Hammer.description: Hammers are used to repairBuilding PiecesandDeployables. Hammers are also used to upgradeBuilding Pieces. In order to do so, the Prospector must have the building pieces in their inventory prior to upgrading. To select the building material, hold R while the Hammer is equipped and select a material from the radial wheel. Once the material is selected, right clicking on a building piece will upgrade it to the selected material if the building piece is currently in the Prospectors inventory.

Wood Spear.name: Wood Spear
Wood Spear.description: The Wood Spear is the firstSpearavailable to prospectors and serves as an alternative to theStone Knife, dealing increased critical damage but with a slower attack speed. Like other spears, the Wood Spear increase the range to which prospectors can attack fauna, providing a unique advantage when up high.

Advanced Pistol.name: Advanced Pistol
Advanced Pistol.description: The Advanced Pistol is the most advancedTier 4handgun with the largest ammo capacity, durability and rate of fire. It firesPistol Ammunitionsuch asArmor Piercing,Explosive,Incendiary,Obsidianor regular9mm Rounds.

Anti-materiel Rifle.name: Anti-materiel Rifle
Anti-materiel Rifle.description: The Anti-materiel Rifle is a bolt-action, anti-materiel rifle with a long effective range and an included scope for viewing the target. It firesSniper Ammunitionpurchased from theWorkshop.

Assault Rifle.name: Assault Rifle
Assault Rifle.description: The Assault Rifle is an automatic firearm with reduced critical damage, +15 round ammo capacity and a high rate of fire. It usesAssault Rifle Ammunitionsuch asArmor Piercing,Explosive,Incendiary,Obsidianor regular5.56mm Rounds.

Automated Defense System: Pistol.name: Automated Defense System: Pistol
Automated Defense System: Pistol.description: Automated Defense System: Pistol is a deployable base defense turret that firesPistol Ammunitionat hostileFauna.

Bolt Action Rifle.name: Bolt Action Rifle
Bolt Action Rifle.description: The Bolt Action Rifle is the first long-rangeFirearmthat prospectors can create. It can utilize the7.62mm Round, theIncendiary Rifle Round, etc. Along with theShotgun, it provides Prospectors with a significant increase in survivability when encountering theFaunaof Icarus. The Bolt Action Rifle can fire 75 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 90 rounds, so bring aMachining Benchfor long trips.

Caveworm Bow.name: Caveworm Bow
Caveworm Bow.description: Using arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows, the Caveworm Bow is harder hitting than theLongbowand is equal in strength to theRecurve Bow.

CHAC \"Boomstick\" Shotgun.name: CHAC "Boomstick" Shotgun
CHAC \"Boomstick\" Shotgun.description: The CHAC "Boomstick" Shotgun is an advanced purchaseableShotgunwith increase projectile and critical damage. It fires anyShotgun Ammunitionand is comparable to otherTier 4Firearms.

CHAC \"Sentinel\" Pistol.name: CHAC "Sentinel" Pistol
CHAC \"Sentinel\" Pistol.description: The CHAC "Sentinel" Pistol is an advanced handgun with increased projectile and critical damage that is comparable, or better than otherTier 4Firearms.

CHAC \"Sovereign\" Rifle.name: CHAC "Sovereign" Rifle
CHAC \"Sovereign\" Rifle.description: The CHAC "Sovereign" Rifle is a purchaseable rifle with a fast reload speed and moderate damage capability.

Compound Bow.name: Compound Bow
Compound Bow.description: The tail-end of the 20th Century brought about many advancements in technology and archery didn't get left behind. A Compound Bow works like a simple block and tackle, multiplying input energy over distance with it's Cam and Idler Wheel pulleys, instead of traditional bow limbs; which allows the Compound Bow to hit harder than theRecurve Bow.

Crossbow.name: Crossbow
Crossbow.description: The earliest known Crossbows were invented on Earth in the first millennium BC, not later than the 7th century BC in ancient China, not later than the 1st century AD in Greece; on Icarus, Prospectors will test this ancient technology in many challenges to see if it still holds up.

Gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
Gunpowder.description: Gunpowder is a precursor resource used in makingAmmunition, weapons like theFrag Grenade, andVolatile Substance.

Hunting Rifle.name: Hunting Rifle
Hunting Rifle.description: The Hunting Rifle is a side-gate loading lever-action rifle, the apex of firearms on Icarus, and a significant upgrade in the long-range firepower available to the Prospector. Like its predecessor theBolt Action Rifle, it fires the7.62mm Round. It and theTrench Shotgunare effective game-changers in surviving theFaunaof Icarus. The Hunting Rifle can fire 100 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 125 rounds, so bring aFabricatorfor long trips.

Inaris \"Heavy\" Crossbow.name: Inaris "Heavy" Crossbow
Inaris \"Heavy\" Crossbow.description: The Inaris "Heavy" Crossbow is the opposite of theInaris "Rapid" Crossbow, trading reload speed for a significant boost to overall damage. The Inaris "Heavy" Crossbow can use CrossbowBoltscrafted on planet as well asBoltscrafted in theWorkshop.

Inaris \"Lune\" Crossbow.name: Inaris "Lune" Crossbow
Inaris \"Lune\" Crossbow.description: The Inaris "Lune" Crossbow can use Crossbow Bolts crafted on planet as well as WorkshopBolts. Firing faster and dealing more damage than its predecessors, the Inaris "Lune" Crossbow, as a whole, is a must for avid Crossbow users.

Inaris \"Rapid\" Crossbow.name: Inaris "Rapid" Crossbow
Inaris \"Rapid\" Crossbow.description: The Inaris "Rapid" Crossbow is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Station. The Inaris "Rapid" Crossbow can use crossbow bolts crafted on planet as well as the bolts crafted in theWorkshop.

Inaris \"Sole\" Crossbow.name: Inaris "Sole" Crossbow
Inaris \"Sole\" Crossbow.description: Using arrows and talents interchangeably with other crossbows, the Inaris "Sole" Crossbow is geared more towards elemental damage. When paired withBoltsthat deal elemental damage (Obsidian Bolts,Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolts, etc), the Inaris "Sole" Crossbow can pack a punch, making it a decent, if not expensive, upgrade to the previous Workshop Crossbows. Dealt elemental damage is not affected by Crossbow talents.

Kinetic Rifle.name: Kinetic Rifle
Kinetic Rifle.description: The Kinetic Rifle is aLegendary WeaponRiflethat can be purchased at theBio-lab.

Larkwell Martinez Compound Bow.name: Larkwell Martinez Compound Bow
Larkwell Martinez Compound Bow.description: The Larkwell Martinez Compound Bow is a stronger, more durable variant of theCompound Bowusing arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: Using arrows and talents interchangeably with otherBows, the Longbow hits harder than theWood Bow.

One-Shot Pistol.name: One-Shot Pistol
One-Shot Pistol.description: The One-Shot Pistol is an inexpensive early-gameTier 2handgun that holds one bullet.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: The Pistol is a single-shot 9mm handgun and is a decent upgrade in firepower available to prospectors. It fires 35 rounds ofPistol Ammunitionbefore breaking, so bring aMachining Bench/Repair Benchfor long trips.

Platinum Crossbow.name: Platinum Crossbow
Platinum Crossbow.description: The Platinum Crossbow is a mid/late game weapon that can penetrate hardened points with a chance to slow targets but has a slower fire rate thanBows.

Recurve Bow.name: Recurve Bow
Recurve Bow.description: The pinnacle of Instinctive Archery, made ofSteelandAluminium, the Recurve Bow hits harder than theLongbow.

Rusty Shotgun.name: Rusty Shotgun
Rusty Shotgun.description: A crude version of theShotgunthat fires slower and holds fewer rounds. It uses any type ofShotgun Ammunition.

Sandworm Bow.name: Sandworm Bow
Sandworm Bow.description: The Sandworm Bow is made with scales from theSandworm, using arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows.

Semi-Automatic Pistol.name: Semi-Automatic Pistol
Semi-Automatic Pistol.description: The Semi-Automatic Pistol is aTier 3handgun with more ammo capacity than thePistol. It fires pistolPistol Ammunitionsuch asArmor Piercing,Explosive,Incendiary,Obsidianor regular9mm Rounds.

Shengong CZ4 Bow.name: Shengong CZ4 Bow
Shengong CZ4 Bow.description: Using arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows, the Shengong CZ4 Bow is geared more towards elemental damage. When paired with arrows that deal elemental damage (Obsidian Arrows,Inaris "Netch" Arrows, etc), the Shengong CZ4 Bow can pack a punch, making it a decent, if not expensive, upgrade to the previous Shengong Bows. Dealt elemental damage is not affected by Bow talents.

Shengong HS2 Bow.name: Shengong HS2 Bow
Shengong HS2 Bow.description: The Shengong HS2 Bow is a stronger variant of the Shengong Bows using arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows. Despite the Shengong HS2 Bow dealing 35% less damage than theLarkwell Martinez Compound Bow, the Shengong HS2 Bow is unmatched in reload speed and fire rate; perfect for the Prospector who wants to fill the skies with arrows.

Shengong \"Jijing\" Bow.name: Shengong "Jijing" Bow
Shengong \"Jijing\" Bow.description: The Shengong "Jijing" Bow is a stronger, more durable variant of theRecurve Bowusing arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows.

Shengong \"Ji\" Bow.name: Shengong "Ji" Bow
Shengong \"Ji\" Bow.description: The Shengong "Ji" Bow is a stronger, more durable variant of theRecurve Bowusing arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows.

Shengong \"Zhang Hu\" Bow.name: Shengong "Zhang Hu" Bow
Shengong \"Zhang Hu\" Bow.description: The Shengong "Zhang Hu" Bow is a stronger, more durable variant of theRecurve Bowusing arrows and talents interchangeably with other bows.

Shotgun.name: Shotgun
Shotgun.description: The Shotgun is one of the firstFirearmsavailable to prospectors. Using12-Gauge Buckshot Shellfor ammunition, the Shotgun is more powerful than theBolt Action Rifleat close range. However, damage decreases rapidly as range increases, and prospectors should not rely on it for long-range encounters with theFaunaof Icarus. The Shotgun can fire 100 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 125 rounds, so bring aMachining Benchfor long trips.

Submachine Gun.name: Submachine Gun
Submachine Gun.description: The Submachine Gun is a compact firearm with low projectile and critical damage, but a high rate of fire. It usesPistol Ammunitionsuch asArmor Piercing,Explosive,Incendiary,Obsidianor regular9mm Rounds.

Tactical Bow.name: Tactical Bow
Tactical Bow.description: The Tactical Bow is an advanced bow that is part of theGreat Hunts CampaignsDLC onPrometheus. It fires any type ofArrowand can be upgraded in theBio-lab.

Titanium Crossbow.name: Titanium Crossbow
Titanium Crossbow.description: The Titanium Crossbow is an upgrade to the Platinum Crossbow that offers a boost to projectile damage and a slightly larger ammo count; has a chance to slow targets and can fully penetrate hardened points, but has a slower fire rate thanBows.

Tomato & Egg Bowl.name: Tomato & Egg Bowl
Tomato & Egg Bowl.description: Tomato & Egg Bowl is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

Trench Shotgun.name: Trench Shotgun
Trench Shotgun.description: The Trench Shotgun is aTier 4variant of theShotgunthat packs a punch and currently is the highest damage dealing close-range weapon available. It uses any type ofShotgun Ammunition. With the highest ammo capacity and projectile damage amongst all three Shotguns, the Trench Shotgun is a go-to for the Shotgun enthusiast in the group. The Trench Shotgun can fire 100 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 125 rounds, so bring aFabricatorfor long trips.

Wood Bow.name: Wood Bow
Wood Bow.description: The Wood Bow is the first bow a player can get access to. It can be unlocked via the Tech Tree inTier 1with no prerequisite tech required.
